passages.name: ELSE02_TheClub
passages.content:
The door squeals as you push it open. A very large man standing inside, dressed business-casual, immediately puts is hand up to halt you from entering.

@@.nobody;"Guest?"@@ he asks gruffly.

@@.maddie;"Um… sort of? I was told I could wait here. I'm supposed to meet Venica next door and--"@@

@@.nobody;"Friend of Venica's?"@@

<<if sa("venica_roomfuck","not") and sa("wolfe_roomfuck","not")>>\
You shrug. @@.maddie;"Friend of a friend?"@@
<<else>>\
You nod. @@.maddie;"Yeah. We're, uh, new friends."@@
<<endif>>\

He grunts. @@.nobody;"You got any money?"@@

@@.maddie;"Oh, is there a cover?"@@

@@.nobody;"No, but you ain't sitting at a table without at least a two large buy-in."@@

//Yikes…//

@@.maddie;"I don't have that kind of money."@@

The bouncer glances at your duffel bag. @@.nobody;"You got a swimsuit or something like that in there?"@@

//Hmm… I don't remember seeing a swimsuit.//

@@.maddie;"No,"@@ you admit.

<<include "XXX_endfornow">>\
passages.content_zh:
門在你推開時發出刺耳的嘎吱聲。一名身材魁梧、穿著商務休閒裝的男人立刻舉起手阻止你進入。

@@.nobody;"訪客？"@@他粗聲問道。

@@.maddie;"呃…算是吧？有人告訴我可以在這裡等。我應該要和隔壁的Venica碰面，然後——"@@

@@.nobody;"Venica的朋友？"@@

[IF sa("venica_roomfuck","not") and sa("wolfe_roomfuck","not")]\
你聳聳肩。@@.maddie;"朋友的朋友？"@@
[ELSE]\
你點點頭。@@.maddie;"對。我們算是…呃，新朋友。"@@
[/IF]\

他哼了一聲。@@.nobody;"身上有錢嗎？"@@

@@.maddie;"哦，要收門票嗎？"@@

@@.nobody;"不用，但你想坐桌位，至少得先消費兩大張。"@@

//天啊…//

@@.maddie;"我沒那麼多錢。"@@

保鑣瞥了你的運動提袋一眼。@@.nobody;"裡面有泳裝之類的嗎？"@@

//嗯…我不記得有看到泳裝。//

@@.maddie;"沒有，"@@你老實承認。

[INCLUDE: XXX_endfornow]\

passages.name: WP201_Office
WP202_Sofa
WP203_Whiskey
passages.content:
<<sa "hadwhiskey">>\
You pour yourself some whiskey and relax back into the sofa.

//Whoa…// you think as you take a sip. //Smooth, I guess, but tastes strong…//

The next hour goes by relatively quickly, as you think about your situation while sipping the whiskey.

//It's getting tastier by the minute!//

Soon your glass is finished and you contemplate maybe having another but you're already feeling a little buzzed and you don't want to drink too much of Venica's liquor.

Thankfully, the door to the office opens before your willpower gives out.

<<include "WP203_Continue">>\
passages.content_zh:
[sa: hadwhiskey]\
你倒了點威士忌，放鬆地靠回沙發。

//哇…//你啜飲時心想。//挺順口的，但感覺很烈…//

接下來一小時過得相當快，你一邊小口喝著威士忌，一邊思考自己的處境。

//越喝越好喝呢！//

很快酒杯見底，你考慮是否再來一杯，但已經感到微醺，而且不想喝掉Venica太多酒。

幸好，在你的意志力投降之前，辦公室的門打開了。

[INCLUDE: WP203_Continue]\

passages.name: WP204_Wait
passages.content:
You decide to refrain from the whiskey and instead sink into the sofa to wait. The next hour goes by relatively quickly as you think about the possible hopelessness of your situation.

Thankfully, the door to the office opens.

<<include "WP203_Continue">>\
passages.content_zh:
你決定不碰威士忌，而是沉進沙發裡等待。接下來一小時在思考自身處境可能有多絕望中快速流逝。

幸好，辦公室的門打開了。

[INCLUDE: WP203_Continue]\

passages.name: WP204_YesVial
WP204_NoVial
passages.content:
@@.maddie;"No, sorry, I just--"@@

@@.venica;"Shush,"@@ Venica says, frowning.

@@.bailey;"See? She won't take it."@@

@@.venica;"Oh, she's just being prissy. <<Maddie>>, go get Larry. The bouncer. Tell him to come in here."@@

//Whew!//

<<include "WP204_Continue">>\
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"不，抱歉，我只是——"@@

@@.venica;"噓，"@@Venica皺眉說道。

@@.bailey;"看吧？她不願意喝。"@@

@@.venica;"哦，她只是太拘謹了。[Maddie]，去叫Larry。那個保鑣。讓他進來這裡。"@@

//呼！//

[INCLUDE: WP204_Continue]\

passages.name: WP205_Truth
passages.content:
You explain the whole situation to Venica, including the fact that you were the victim of the bet Shaw and Toby made that transformed you from Matt into <<Maddie>>. You also tell her about Doug's plan to get a new body and sign over his life insurance to the Wolfe Pack as payment for the debt Shaw and Toby owe.

@@.venica;"Well, shit!"@@ she finally says, laughing. @@.venica;"That fuckin' cripple's got the whole thing all planned up! You know, I always thought men would be real dangerous if not for their overwhelmin' need to constantly bury their dick in some wet hole. This about proves it, eh?"@@

You shrug, not sure what to say to that.

@@.venica;"We could to you to the hospital, try to figure out what poison he gave you -- if he really did give you poison. Could be a trick. And then, of course, there's lots of questions at the hospital. Nosy fuckers, them doctors."@@ Venica frowns and shakes her head. @@.venica;"I think that idea's out. Could just go kill Doug -- that's our tried-and-tested solution to all sorts of problems -- but that leaves you dead, probably."@@

She sighs and leans back in her chair with her hands behind her head.

@@.venica;"I suppose we gotta play the game and get the pudgy fuck a new body. So, let me ask, who's it gonna be? Shaw? Or Toby?"@@

@@.maddie;"Shaw or Toby?"@@

@@.venica;"Well yeah! They're the only two that really deserve it. I'll get the boys to go around and take whichever one and haul his ass to Doug's. Of course, the other one is still a loose end, so he's gotta go too. Doesn't really matter which one you pick, then, they're both gonna stop existing one way or another. Which do you think Doug will want?"@@

//Doug would probably want [[Shaw's body|WP206_Shaw]]… handsome big-muscled guy that he is. But [[Toby's body|WP206_Toby]] would have advantages -- mostly because he's a bit younger and less socially-connected than Shaw, which would make it easier to assume his identity.//
passages.content_zh:
你向Venica解釋了整個情況，包括你是Shaw和Toby打賭的受害者，從Matt變成了[Maddie]。你還告訴她Doug的計劃——他想獲得一具新身體，並將他的人壽保險簽給Wolfe Pack，以償還Shaw和Toby欠下的債務。

@@.venica;"哇靠，真是夠了！"@@她終於大笑著說道。@@.venica;"那個該死的瘸子把整件事都計畫好了！你知道嗎，我一直覺得要不是男人總有種壓倒性的需求，非得把老二塞進什麼濕漉漉的洞裡，他們其實會非常危險。這下可證明了，對吧？"@@

你聳聳肩，不知道該怎麼回應。

@@.venica;"我們可以送你去醫院，試著查清楚他給你下了什麼毒——如果他真的下了毒的話。也可能是騙局。而且，醫院那邊肯定會問個沒完。那些醫生啊，都是愛管閒事的混帳。"@@Venica皺起眉頭搖了搖頭。@@.venica;"我覺得這主意行不通。也可以直接去殺了Doug——這是我們解決各種問題的老方法——但那樣你可能也會死。"@@

她嘆了口氣，雙手枕在腦後，靠回椅子上。

@@.venica;"我想我們得照著遊戲規則走，幫那個肥豬搞一具新身體。那麼，讓我問問，會是誰呢？Shaw？還是Toby？"@@

@@.maddie;"Shaw或Toby？"@@

@@.venica;"對啊！只有他們兩個真正活該。我會叫弟兄們去把選中的那個抓來，拖到Doug那兒。當然，另一個也是個麻煩，所以也得處理掉。其實你選誰都一樣，反正他們倆遲早都會消失。你覺得Doug會想要哪一個？"@@

//Doug很可能會想要[Shaw的身體]……畢竟他是個英俊的肌肉男。但[Toby的身體]也有優勢——主要是因為他比Shaw年輕一些，社會關係也沒那麼複雜，這會讓冒充他的身份更容易。//

passages.name: WP205_Plan
passages.content:
<<outfit $player.outfit keep>>\
<<outfit 'bondage'>>\
@@.maddie;"Doug has a plan,"@@ you say.

Venica snorts. @@.venica;"That fuckin' cripple doesn't do shit else but plot and scheme."@@ She sighs and makes a gesture for you to go on.

@@.maddie;"If you can get him a body, he'll sign over his life insurance to the Wolfe Pack."@@

@@.venica;"Uh… what?"@@

@@.maddie;"See, he wants to transfer himself -- I guess his brain or maybe just his mind or… I dunno -- but he wants to put himself into a new body, however he's gonna do that. He just needs a body. Like, a live one, so he can take over their life."@@

@@.venica;"Fuck. He can really do that?"@@

You shrug. @@.maddie;"He says he can."@@

@@.venica;"Huh. Well… okay. Fuck it. So we get him a body and -- how much is his life insurance, anyway?"@@

@@.maddie;"He said a million dollars."@@

Venica's eyebrows go up. @@.venica;"And we get all of it?"@@

You nod.

@@.venica;"Well, fuckin' A then! And he's not picky about the body?"@@

@@.maddie;"He said he'd like to be a muscular type of guy, but um, 'any port in a storm' he said."@@

@@.venica;"All right then. We're in. I'll have the boys round up someone suiting, eh? Take him off to Doug's and get our fuckin' money and that's that."@@ Venica raps her fingers on her desk. @@.venica;"How about you? What are you gettin' out of this deal?"@@

@@.maddie;"I need… well, I need someplace to stay. And a job, hopefully. I don't have anything."@@

@@.venica;"Oh, I see! Doug gets a new life and rids himself of a deadbeat."@@ She laughs. @@.venica;"You're part of the deal, honey, whether you realized it or not."@@

<<if tr("investigative") gt 3>>\
//I kinda already knew that…//

@@.venica;"Oh, I see you already worked that out. Smart girl. But what an asshole, eh? But hey, the deal's done, darlin'. Only question is what am I gonna do with you?"@@
<<else>>\
//It's true… Doug didn't just send me here with a message, he was getting rid of me!//

@@.venica;"Yep, I see you just realized it.
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"Doug 有個計劃，"@@ 你說。

Venica 哼了一聲。@@.venica;"那個天殺的殘廢除了密謀策劃之外屁事不幹。"@@ 她嘆了口氣，做了個手勢示意你繼續說。

@@.maddie;"如果你能幫他弄到一具身體，他就會把他的人壽保險簽給 Wolfe Pack。"@@

@@.venica;"呃…什麼？"@@

@@.maddie;"是這樣的，他想轉移自己——我猜是他的大腦，或者只是他的意識，或…我不知道——但他想把自己放進一具新的身體裡，不管他打算怎麼做。他只需要一具身體。像是，活生生的身體，這樣他就能接管那個人的生活。"@@

@@.venica;"操。他真的能辦到？"@@

你聳聳肩。@@.maddie;"他說他可以。"@@

@@.venica;"哼。嗯…好吧。去他的。所以我們幫他弄一具身體，然後——他的人壽保險到底有多少錢？"@@

@@.maddie;"他說有一百萬美元。"@@

Venica 挑起了眉毛。@@.venica;"而我們能拿到全部？"@@

你點點頭。

@@.venica;"哇靠，那還真他媽棒！那他對身體不挑剔嗎？"@@

@@.maddie;"他說他想要肌肉型的男人，但呃，他說『風暴中任何港口都是好的』。"@@

@@.venica;"那好吧。我們加入。我會讓兄弟們去物色個合適的人，嗯？把他帶去 Doug 那兒，拿到我們他媽的錢，就這樣。"@@ Venica 用手指敲了敲她的桌子。@@.venica;"那你呢？你從這筆交易裡能得到什麼？"@@

@@.maddie;"我需要…嗯，我需要個地方住。還有，希望有份工作。我什麼都沒有。"@@

@@.venica;"噢，我懂了！Doug 得到了新生活，還甩掉了一個累贅。"@@ 她笑了。@@.venica;"親愛的，不管你有沒有意識到，你都是這交易的一部分。"@@

[IF tr("investigative") gt 3]
//我大概已經知道了…//

@@.venica;"噢，我看你已經想明白了。聰明的女孩。但真是個混蛋，對吧？不過嘿，交易已經定了，親愛的。唯一的問題是，我該拿你怎麼辦？"@@
[ELSE]
//這是真的…Doug 不只是派我來傳話，他是在擺脫我！//

@@.venica;"沒錯，我看你剛剛才意識到。真是個混蛋，對吧？但是，交易已經定了，親愛的。唯一的問題是，我該拿你怎麼辦？"@@
[/IF]

@@.maddie;"呃——"@@

Venica 舉起手示意你安靜。

[IF sa("venica_roomfuck")]
@@.venica;"聽著，親愛的，我喜歡你。真的。所以我不會把你扔到外面世界，讓你最後變成個毒蟲妓女。"@@ Venica 微笑。@@.venica;"你會成為我的女孩，對吧，甜心？"@@
[ELSE]
@@.venica;"聽著，親愛的，我喜歡你。而我的兄弟們呢，嗯，他們真的很喜歡你。他們一直沒停過談論在 Doug 那兒幹你火辣屁股的事。所以我不會把你扔到外面世界，讓你最後變成個毒蟲妓女。"@@ Venica 微笑。@@.venica;"你會讓我的兄弟們開心，對吧，甜心？"@@
[/IF]

別無選擇，你點了點頭。

@@.venica;"這才是好女孩。"@@

她站起來，走向靠在你座位旁邊牆上的一個衣櫃。她轉動密碼鎖，打開了門。

[IF $trait.intobondage neq true]
@@.venica;"現在呢，你可能不會像我一樣享受你的新工作，但在這裡每個人都得有份工作。"@@

她從衣櫃裡拿出一捆皮帶和鋼鍊，朝你走來。
[ELSE]
@@.venica;"別擔心，你會喜歡這個的，"@@ 她一邊說，一邊從衣櫃裡拿出一捆皮帶和鋼鍊，朝你走來。
[/IF]

Venica 二話不說，把你拉起來，開始脫你的衣服。她將你的衣物扔到一旁的沙發上，開始將一件複雜的皮革束縛帶扣在你身上。

[IF tr("exhibitionism") gt 2]
//嗯！這感覺比單純裸體還要赤裸！//
[ELSE]
//噢…我的奶子完全露出來了！這幾乎什麼都沒遮住！//
[/IF]

她推你坐下，將你的腳套進一雙高跟露趾涼鞋。完成後，她將一條牽繩鎖在項圈的環上，用它把你拉起來站好。

Venica 上下打量著你，咧嘴笑了。

[IF sa("venica_roomfuck")]
@@.venica;"完美。我一直想要個辦公室吉祥物。"@@
[ELSE]
@@.venica;"噢，你成了個很棒的辦公室吉祥物。我也可以好好享受你的陪伴，就像我兄弟們會做的那樣，嗯？"@@
[/IF]

@@.maddie;"呃…"@@

@@.venica;"別擔心，親愛的，你只需要在工作時間穿你的制服。"@@ 她舔

passages.name: WP204_Continue
passages.content:
You leave the office to get Larry.

@@.maddie;"Venica wants to see you,"@@ you tell him.

He looks worried. @@.nobody;"Look, I told you I didn't know who you were. I didn't mean any insult or nothin' like that."@@

@@.maddie;"No, it's not about me. I didn't say anything to her. She just asked me to come get you."@@

He grunts and heads back to the office with you following him.

@@.venica;"Larry,"@@ Venica says as soon as he enters. @@.venica;"Take a sip of this jello shot here. Bailey swears we should serve it. I guess it tastes like semen or something."@@ She laughs.

Larry steps up and takes the vial Venica is offering. You go back to your seat on the sofa.

@@.venica;"Just a little sip, now. That's the only sample we have."@@

@@.nobody;"Yes, ma'am,"@@ Larry says, unstoppering the vial. He takes a taste of the vial and scowls. @@.nobody;"Ugh. Fuck no, that tastes terrible, boss."@@

Venica laughs and takes the vial back from him. @@.venica;"Yep, that's what I thought. We ain't buyin' it, Bailey. All right, get back to work, Larry."@@

@@.nobody;"Yes, ma'am."@@ Larry quickly retreats from the room.

@@.venica;"There, see?"@@

@@.bailey;"But you don't even like Larry."@@

@@.venica;"I like him more than you like Parker right now,"@@ she says, smirking. @@.venica;"Besides, I got no reason to kill Larry, he does a decent job at the door and I pay him fuckin' peanuts."@@

She holds up the vial and Bailey takes it and slips it into the pocket of his too-tight jeans.

@@.venica;"That means we got a deal."@@

@@.bailey;"Fine."@@

@@.venica;"Business concluded, then. Tell Parker I'm rootin' for him, okay?"@@

Bailey turns and leaves without a word.

<<if sa("venica_roomfuck")>>\
@@.venica;"That just leaves us,"@@ she says, gazing at you. @@.venica;"Did you come by for some more one-on-one fun? Or do you have one of those alternate motives?"@@
<<else>>\
@@.venica;"That just leaves you,"@@ she says, gazing at you. @@.venica;"Did you come by to see my brothers again? Or do
passages.content_zh:
你離開辦公室去找Larry。

@@.maddie;"Venica想見你，"@@你告訴他。

他看起來很擔憂。@@.nobody;"聽著，我跟你說過我不知道你是誰。我沒有冒犯的意思，真的沒有。"@@

@@.maddie;"不，不是關於我的事。我沒跟她說什麼。她只是要我來找你。"@@

他咕噥了一聲，轉身走向辦公室，你跟在他身後。

@@.venica;"Larry，"@@Venica在他一進門就開口。@@.venica;"嚐一口這個果凍酒。Bailey發誓我們應該供應這個。我猜它嚐起來像精液還是什麼的。"@@她笑了起來。

Larry走上前接過Venica遞來的小瓶子。你回到沙發上的座位。

@@.venica;"就一小口，現在。這是我們唯一的樣品。"@@

@@.nobody;"是的，女士，"@@Larry說著，拔開瓶塞。他嚐了一口瓶子裡的東西，皺起臉。@@.nobody;"呃。幹，不行，這味道太糟了，老闆。"@@

Venica笑著從他手中拿回瓶子。@@.venica;"沒錯，我就知道。我們不會買的，Bailey。好了，回去工作吧，Larry。"@@

@@.nobody;"是的，女士。"@@Larry迅速退出了房間。

@@.venica;"看吧？"@@

@@.bailey;"但你甚至不喜歡Larry。"@@

@@.venica;"我對他的喜歡，比你現在對Parker的喜歡還多，"@@她說著，露出似笑非笑的表情。@@.venica;"再說，我沒理由害Larry，他在門口幹得還行，而且我他媽付他花生米那麼點錢。"@@

她舉起瓶子，Bailey接過去，塞進他那條過緊的牛仔褲口袋裡。

@@.venica;"這表示我們成交了。"@@

@@.bailey;"行。"@@

@@.venica;"那麼，生意談完了。告訴Parker我支持他，好嗎？"@@

Bailey轉身一言不發地離開了。

[IF sa("venica_roomfuck")]\
@@.venica;"這下就剩我們了，"@@她說著，凝視著你。@@.venica;"你是來找更多一對一的樂子嗎？還是你有什麼其他動機？"@@
[ELSE]\
@@.venica;"這下就剩你了，"@@她說著，凝視著你。@@.venica;"你是來看我兄弟們的嗎？還是你有什麼其他動機？"@@
[/IF]\

[告訴她全部真相] 或只 [告訴她Doug的計劃]——關於獲得新身體並將他的人壽保險轉讓給Wolfe Pack。

passages.name: WP203_Continue
passages.content: <>\ Venica steps in followed by a tall, fit young man. He has on an overly tight t-shirt and close-fit jeans with immaculate white sneakers. His sandy blond hair is perfectly styled and he wears a short, neatly trimmed goatee and a pair of black-framed eyeglasses. <>\ @@.venica;"Bailey,"@@ she says to the man, waving her hand towards you, @@.venica;"this is my girlfriend, <>. <>, this is Bailey -- a business partner."@@ //Girlfriend? That's a little forward, isn't it?// <>\ @@.venica;"Bailey,"@@ she says to the man, waving her hand towards you, @@.venica;"this is a new friend of the Pack, <>. <>, this is Bailey -- a business partner."@@ <>\ You stand up, moving to shake Bailey's hand, but he waves you off and returns his attention to Venica. @@.bailey;"I should not have to ask to get paid when I've done the work."@@ @@.venica;"Sit, love,"@@ Venica tells you as she walks over. You sit down. <>\ Venica takes the empty glass from your hand and refills it with the amber liquid. She hands the glass of whiskey back to you then makes herself one as well. After a brief brush of her fingers on your shoulder, she turns back to Bailey. <>\ Venica fills a glass with amber liquid and hands the glass of whiskey to you. She then makes one for herself as well. @@.nobody;"聲音再低點。有必要的話就用氣音說，懂嗎？還有把屁股翹出來。像這樣。"@@他粗暴地擺弄你站成他想要的姿勢，猛地將你的胯部往前推。@@.nobody;"對，這就對了。該死，還不賴。就算知道你襪子底下有臭屄，我都願意讓你幫我吹喇叭。"@@

//真是會說話啊…//

保鑣把你安置在他原先站的位置，並捏了把你的屁股。

@@.nobody;"媽的，真希望男人的屁股也能長成這樣，"@@他笑著說。@@.nobody;"聽著，你會被摸個幾下。工作的一部分。就他媽忍著點。別讓那些愛亂摸的混帳太靠近你的奶子或騷屄，懂嗎？要是穿幫了，你他媽瞬間就會被扔出去，親愛的。明白了？"@@

你點點頭。

@@.nobody;"好孩子。"@@他咂了咂嘴。@@.nobody;"想喝點什麼嗎？"@@

//我想我可以[喝一杯]放鬆一下，或者直接[拒絕他]。//

passages.name: WP200_Invited
passages.content:
@@.maddie;"Venica asked me to come by."@@

He frowns. @@.nobody;"Did she now? And just when was your appointment?"@@

@@.maddie;"She just said to come by."@@

@@.nobody;"Oh yeah? And who are you?"@@

@@.maddie;"<<Maddie>>."@@

The bouncer clears his throat and steps aside. @@.nobody;"You shoulda just said,"@@ he scolds you but then looks like he wishes he hadn't. @@.nobody;"Venica did say you were comin' by. I can't have you hangin' around the bar, though, the customers don't like it. You can go around the back of the bar there into that door, see? The door to Venica's office will be the first one on your left in that hallway. You can wait there."@@

You step by him but he holds up his hand for you to wait.

@@.nobody;"Look, I didn't mean to give you a hard time or nothin' you know? Sorry about that."@@

He tries on a smile and lets you go on your way.

You step around the bar and proceed into the hallway, then open the first door on the left to go into [[Venica's office|WP201_Office]].
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"Venica叫我過來的。"@@

他皺起眉頭。@@.nobody;"是嗎？那你的預約時間是什麼時候？"@@

@@.maddie;"她只說要我過來。"@@

@@.nobody;"哦？那你是誰？"@@

@@.maddie;"[Maddie]。"@@

保鑣清了清喉嚨讓到一旁。@@.nobody;"你早該這麼說，"@@他責備你，但隨即露出後悔的表情。@@.nobody;"Venica確實提過你會來。但我不能讓你在酒吧逗留，客人不喜歡這樣。你可以繞到酒吧後面那扇門進去，看到了嗎？Venica辦公室的門就是走廊左邊第一間。你可以在那裡等。"@@

你從他身旁走過，但他抬手示意你稍等。

@@.nobody;"聽著，我不是故意找你麻煩什麼的，知道嗎？剛才抱歉了。"@@

他擠出笑容，放你繼續前行。

你繞過酒吧走進走廊，然後打開左側第一扇門進入[Venica的辦公室]。

passages.name: WP101_Drink
passages.content:
@@.maddie;"Yeah,"@@ you say in your best gravelly whisper.

He smirks. @@.nobody;"There ya go. Keep that up."@@

The bouncer saunters over to the bar and starts chatting with the bartender -- another beefy man in strappy black leather. He returns with a foamy beer and sets it on the small table beside the door.

@@.nobody;"Drink up, boy."@@

You take a swig from the glass of beer. //Wow, that tastes like rotten cabbage…//

The bouncer laughs as you try to smile through the taste.

@@.nobody;"Well, yeah, it ain't gonna win no brewing awards but it's an eleven percentage."@@

<<include "WP102_Bouncing">>\
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"好啊，"@@你盡力用沙啞的氣音說道。

他咧嘴一笑。@@.nobody;"這就對了。保持下去。"@@

保鑣晃到酒吧邊，開始和酒保聊天——那是另一個穿著黑色繫帶皮衣的壯漢。他帶著一杯泡沫滿溢的啤酒回來，放在門邊的小桌上。

@@.nobody;"喝吧，小子。"@@

你從啤酒杯裡灌了一大口。//哇，這味道像爛掉的包心菜…//

你試圖在噁心味道中擠出微笑時，保鑣大笑起來。

@@.nobody;"嗯，對，這玩意兒是拿不了釀酒獎，但酒精濃度有十一趴。"@@

[INCLUDE: WP102_Bouncing]\

passages.name: WP101_NoDrink
passages.content:
@@.maddie;"No thanks,"@@ you say in your best gravelly whisper.

He smirks. @@.nobody;"There ya go. Keep that up."@@

The bouncer saunters over to the bar and starts chatting with the bartender -- another beefy man in strappy black leather.

<<include "WP102_Bouncing">>\
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"不用了，謝謝，"@@你盡力用沙啞的氣音說道。

他咧嘴一笑。@@.nobody;"這就對了。保持下去。"@@

保鑣晃到酒吧邊，開始和酒保聊天——那是另一個穿著黑色繫帶皮衣的壯漢。

[INCLUDE: WP102_Bouncing]\

passages.name: WP102_Bouncing
passages.content:
Customers start to trickle in but the pace picks up in the afternoon. The empty lot around the bar starts filling up with beaters and trucks and a few nice cars.

Although you endure a few pinches and slaps here and there, most of the customers just pay their cover after eye-fucking you and continue on their way.

//Jeez when is Venica getting here?//

A very nice car pulls up right near the door, as if that spot were reserved for it.

//Oh, maybe that's her!//

But out of the car steps a very fit and rather tall young man.

He has on an overly tight t-shirt and close-fit jeans with immaculate white sneakers. His sandy blond hair is perfectly styled and he wears a short, neatly trimmed goatee and a pair of black-framed eyeglasses.

@@.bailey;"Hey,"@@ he says as he steps up to the door. His eyes rove over your body and pause for a moment as they catch sight of the sock stuffed in your shorts. He looks up to you, smiling with pearly white teeth. @@.bailey;"They finally replaced that fat fuck Larry, huh? Well, fuck me."@@ He grins. @@.bailey;"Aren't you just the twink of my dreams?"@@

You clear your throat and grumble, @@.maddie;"Twenty bucks."@@

He laughs. @@.bailey;"Is that the cover charge or…?"@@

//Oh jeez does he think…?//

@@.maddie;"Cover charge,"@@ you say, wiggling your fingers for cash.

@@.bailey;"Man of little words. I like that."@@ He pulls a large wad of cash out of his pocket and presses a twenty dollar bill into your hand, closing your fist around with his own slender fingers. @@.bailey;"Normally I don't pay cover, but I just can't say no to you. My name's Bailey and I would definitely like to talk to you once I'm done with some business. What's your name, pretty boy?"@@

@@.maddie;"Matt,"@@ you say, as it's the first 'male' name to come to mind.

He smiles. @@.bailey;"Hmm, Matt."@@ He looks you over again. @@.bailey;"I'll be right back, Matt. And we can have our chat."@@ He winks and slips by you, running his fingers across your stomach as he does.
passages.content_zh:
顧客開始三三兩兩地進來，但下午時分人潮逐漸增多。酒吧周圍的空地開始停滿破舊的車、卡車，還有幾輛不錯的轎車。

雖然你偶爾得忍受幾下捏掐和拍打，但大多數顧客只是用眼神狠狠意淫你一番，付了入場費後就繼續往裡走。

//天啊，Venica 到底什麼時候才到？//

一輛非常漂亮的車直接停在門邊，彷彿那個位置是專門為它保留的。

//噢，說不定就是她！//

但從車裡出來的，是一位身材精實、相當高大的年輕男子。

他穿著過緊的T恤和貼身牛仔褲，腳上是潔白無瑕的白色運動鞋。他沙金色的頭髮梳得完美有型，留著短而修剪整齊的山羊鬍，戴著一副黑框眼鏡。

@@.bailey;"嘿，"@@ 他走到門口時說道。他的目光在你身上游移，瞥見你短褲裡塞著的襪子時停頓了片刻。他抬頭看向你，露出珍珠般潔白的牙齒微笑。@@.bailey;"他們終於換掉那個死胖子 Larry 了，是吧？哇靠。"@@ 他咧嘴一笑。@@.bailey;"你不就是我夢寐以求的小鮮肉嗎？"@@

你清了清喉嚨，咕噥道：@@.maddie;"二十塊。"@@

他笑了。@@.bailey;"這是入場費還是……？"@@

//噢天啊，他該不會以為……？//

@@.maddie;"入場費，"@@ 你說著，晃了晃手指示意要現金。

@@.bailey;"話不多的男人。我喜歡。"@@ 他從口袋掏出一大疊鈔票，將一張二十元紙鈔按進你手裡，用他纖細的手指將你的拳頭闔上。@@.bailey;"通常我不付入場費的，但就是沒辦法拒絕你。我叫 Bailey，等我處理完一些事情後，絕對想跟你聊聊。你叫什麼名字，漂亮男孩？"@@

@@.maddie;"Matt，"@@ 你說道，這是第一個浮現在腦海的「男性」名字。

他微笑。@@.bailey;"嗯，Matt。"@@ 他又打量了你一遍。@@.bailey;"我馬上回來，Matt。我們可以好好聊一聊。"@@ 他眨眨眼，從你身邊溜了進去，經過時手指還滑過你的腹部。

//呼，我剛剛是不是顫抖了一下？//

又收了幾位顧客的錢後，你最初在酒吧遇到的那位保鑣走到你身旁。

@@.nobody;"Venica 在後面，"@@ 他說，朝酒吧旁邊的一扇門甩了甩頭。@@.nobody;"她現在要見你。"@@

@@.maddie;"謝謝，"@@ 你說著，開始朝那扇門走去。

@@.nobody;"只是，呃，在裡面小心點，懂嗎？"@@ 他微微皺眉，濃密的眉毛擰在一起。@@.nobody;"那條狡猾的蛇 Bailey 也在裡面跟她在一起，他可是個真正的麻煩製造者。"@@

[IF sa("venica_roomfuck") or sa("wolfe_roomfuck")]\
//噢……Bailey 以為我是男生……但 Venica 很清楚我絕對不是……該死……//
[ELSE]\
//噢……Bailey 以為我是男生……嗯……//
[/IF]\

@@.maddie;"呃，好的，謝謝。"@@

保鑣點了點頭。

你 [走向後面的房間]，Venica 和 Bailey 正在那裡等著你。

passages.name: WP103_Backroom
passages.content:
<<if sa("venica_met")>>\
You step into the back room. Venica is seated behind an expensive-looking desk and Bailey is leaning against the wall next to it.

@@.venica;"Come on in, why don't ya?"@@ Venica waves for you to sit in the chair in front of her desk.

You sit were she indicated.

@@.venica;"I don't think it's bright enough in here for them shades, eh?"@@ She wiggles her finger at your sunglasses.

The moment you take them off, Venica smiles and her eyebrows go up.

//Of course she recognizes me…//

@@.bailey;"Told you he was cute,"@@ Bailey says.

Venica nods. @@.venica;"Yeah, almost too cute to believe,"@@ she says, smirking. @@.venica;"When Bailey here told me that he sure did like our new bouncer, I was real confused. You see, nobody hires anyone around here without MY approval."@@ Venica leans forward, smiling a knife-edge sharp smile. @@.venica;"But now that I meet you, Matt, I can see why Larry made such a… snap decision. I think you're going to be a very, very welcome asset here."@@

@@.bailey;"Careful how you talk to my new boyfriend, Venica,"@@ Bailey says. He shoots you a wink.

Venica rolls her eyes and gives Bailey an unconvincing smile. @@.venica;"Well, before you go and ruin my new door boy with sweat and semen, we gotta talk employment terms. Privately."@@

@@.bailey;"All right, fine. I'll be back at closing so we can have our chat, Matt."@@

He brushes his fingers across your neck as he walks by you to leave. The door clunks shut behind him.

Venica immediately laughs. @@.venica;"Fuckballs, <<Maddie>>, you're gonna be in SO much shit when Bailey finds out he's been smitten by a cockless snatch. That silly faggot really prides himself on being 'above' us girls!"@@ She laughs again, slapping her desk.

When she finally settles down, she gives you a serious look and shakes her head.

@@.venica;"All fun aside, it IS bad news for you. No joke!"@@ She smirks. @@.venica;"But, lucky for you, we're gonna help each other out. Because I know you weren't
passages.content_zh:
[IF sa("venica_met")]
你走進後面的房間。Venica 坐在一張看起來很昂貴的桌子後面，Bailey 則靠在她旁邊的牆上。

@@.venica;"進來吧，還等什麼呢？"@@ Venica 揮手示意你坐在她桌前的椅子上。

你在她指定的位置坐下。

@@.venica;"我覺得這裡的光線還沒亮到需要戴那副墨鏡，嗯？"@@ 她對著你的太陽眼鏡搖了搖手指。

你一摘下墨鏡，Venica 就笑了起來，眉毛也跟著上揚。

//她當然認得我…//

@@.bailey;"我跟你說過他很可愛吧，"@@ Bailey 說道。

Venica 點點頭。@@.venica;"是啊，可愛得幾乎讓人難以置信，"@@ 她說著，露出一個似笑非笑的表情。@@.venica;"當 Bailey 這傢伙告訴我他確實很喜歡我們的新保鏢時，我真的很困惑。你知道嗎，在這附近，沒有我的批准，沒人能雇用任何人。"@@ Venica 身體前傾，露出一個鋒利如刀的笑容。@@.venica;"但現在見到你，Matt，我明白為什麼 Larry 會做出這麼…倉促的決定了。我想你在這裡會成為一個非常、非常受歡迎的資產。"@@

@@.bailey;"注意你跟我新男友說話的口氣，Venica，"@@ Bailey 說。他朝你眨了眨眼。

Venica 翻了個白眼，給了 Bailey 一個不怎麼真誠的微笑。@@.venica;"好吧，在你用汗水和精液毀了我的新門童之前，我們得先談談雇用條件。私下談。"@@

@@.bailey;"好吧，行。打烊時我會回來，我們再好好聊聊，Matt。"@@

他走過你身邊離開時，手指輕輕拂過你的脖子。門在他身後砰地一聲關上。

Venica 立刻大笑起來。@@.venica;"我操，[Maddie]，等 Bailey 發現自己迷上一個沒雞巴的小穴時，你他媽的麻煩可就大了！那個愚蠢的基佬還真以自己『高於』我們這些女孩為榮呢！"@@ 她又笑了起來，拍打著桌子。

等她終於平靜下來，她認真地看著你，搖了搖頭。

@@.venica;"玩笑歸玩笑，這對你來說確實是個壞消息。不開玩笑！"@@ 她得意地笑著。@@.venica;"不過，算你走運，我們可以互相幫忙。因為我知道你跟他說你叫 Matt 時，並沒有說謊。"@@

//糟了…//

@@.venica;"沒錯，我知道你就是那個跛子用來做實驗的傢伙。而且，我得說，那個胖嘟嘟的混蛋對你還真不錯。你真是個甜美的尤物，[Maddie]。你該心存感激！不是嗎？現在跟我說實話，親愛的小甜心，你現在是不是比以前任何時候都快樂？"@@

//也許我對自己的處境並不滿意，但[我確實更快樂]了，不是嗎？或者也許[我並不快樂]，對於事情發展成這樣，或是那些強加在我身上的改變。//
[ELSE]
[sa: venica_met]
你走進後面的房間。Venica 坐在一張看起來很昂貴的桌子後面，Bailey 則靠在她旁邊的牆上。

@@.venica;"進來吧，還等什麼呢？"@@ Venica 揮手示意你坐在她桌前的椅子上。

你在她指定的位置坐下。

@@.venica;"我覺得這裡的光線還沒亮到需要戴那副墨鏡，嗯？"@@ 她對著你的太陽眼鏡搖了搖手指。

當你摘下太陽眼鏡時，Venica 的眉毛揚了起來。

@@.bailey;"我跟你說過他很可愛吧，"@@ Bailey 說道。

Venica 點點頭。@@.venica;"是啊，他確實是。Matt，對吧？"@@

@@.maddie;"是的。"@@

@@.venica;"好吧，Matt，當 Bailey 這傢伙告訴我他確實很喜歡我們的新保鏢時，我真的很困惑。你知道嗎，在這附近，沒有我的批准，沒人能雇用任何人。"@@ Venica 身體前傾，露出一個鋒利如刀的笑容。@@.venica;"但現在見到你，我想我這次就原諒 Larry 吧。"@@

@@.bailey;"要我說，該給那個胖混蛋加薪。"@@

Venica 翻了個白眼。@@.venica;"那個胖混蛋沒因為把工作讓出去而挨揍，算他走運。"@@ 她似乎因為這個想法而高興起來。@@.venica;"但是，你知道嗎，他確實把工作讓出來了。所以他得去找另一份工作。因為我們這裡的男孩 Matt 想要這個新空缺的職位。對吧，Matt？"@@

你點點頭。

@@.venica;"很好。現在我們得談談雇用條件了。"@@ 她轉頭看向 Bailey。@@.venica;"私下談。"@@

Bailey 哼了一聲。@@.bailey;"好吧，行，我懂了。打烊時我會回來，我們再好好聊聊，Matt。"@@

他走過你身邊離開時，手指輕輕拂過你的脖子。門在他身後砰地一聲關上。

Venica 嘆了口氣，向後靠在椅子上。@@

passages.name: WP103_Happy
passages.content:
You nod. @@.maddie;"I am happier."@@

@@.venica;"Fuckin' A right you are! Being a woman is the best thing in the world. Oh, sure, the boys think they run things but the truth is we girls do, ain't that right? Fuckers wouldn't do nothing at all if there weren't a chance at some sweet ass somewhere along the line. That's a fact."@@

//I guess that's kinda true…//

<<include "WP104_ShawFate">>\
passages.content_zh:
你點點頭。@@.maddie;"我比較快樂了。"@@

@@.venica;"他媽的當然啦！當女人是這世上最棒的事。噢，當然啦，那些男人以為是他們在掌控一切，但真相是我們女孩才是主宰，對吧？要是沒有甜美的屁股可嚐，那些混帳根本什麼都不會做。這是事實。"@@

//我想這有點道理...//

[INCLUDE: WP104_ShawFate]\

passages.name: WP103_Unhappy
passages.content:
@@.maddie;"I'm not really any happier."@@

Venica snorts. @@.venica;"Well you fuckin' SHOULD be. Fuck, girl, I don't ''what'' it would take to make you happy if you're not happy at this point."@@

She shrugs and throws up her hands as if to say 'whatever!'

<<include "WP104_ShawFate">>\
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"我並沒有真的比較快樂。"@@

Venica 哼了一聲。@@.venica;"嗯，你他媽的「應該」要快樂才對。靠，女孩，到了這個地步你還不快樂，我真不知道「什麼」才能讓你開心。"@@

她聳聳肩，雙手一攤，彷彿在說『隨便啦！』

[INCLUDE: WP104_ShawFate]\

passages.name: WP104_Lies
passages.content: <<include "XXX_endfornow">>\

passages.name: WP104_ShawKill
passages.content:
<<sa "shaw_fate" "kill">>\
Venica looks surprised.

@@.venica;"Kill him, eh? Well, didn't see you making that choice but fuck yeah, sweetheart, it's no less than he deserves. Now how about Toby? Such as sweet-acting guy, isn't he? But he's a fuckin' creep. I knew it the moment I met him. Sneaky little selfish fucker. Choice is yours, darlin'. Kill 'em, beat 'em, shoot 'em up with the cripple's gunk?"@@

<<include "WP105_TobyFate">>\
passages.content_zh:
\
Venica 看起來很驚訝。

@@.venica;"殺了他，嗯？好吧，沒想到你會做這個選擇，不過他媽的沒錯，親愛的，這是他應得的。那 Toby 呢？他看起來是個貼心的傢伙，對吧？但他真是個他媽的變態。我見到他的第一眼就知道了。鬼鬼祟祟又自私的混帳。選擇權在你，親愛的。殺了他們、痛揍他們，還是給他們注射殘廢藥劑？"@@

[INCLUDE: WP105_TobyFate]\

passages.name: WP104_ShawBeat
passages.content:
<<sa "shaw_fate" "beat">>\
Venica nods.

@@.venica;"Yeah, a good beat down is just what the doctor ordered for that asshole. Now how about Toby? Such as sweet-acting guy, isn't he? But he's a fuckin' creep. I knew it the moment I met him. You follow Ritter down to the parking garage under the building. Dave and Kara joke with each other and it becomes clear to you that they must be good friends.

@@.kara;"Guest gets to pick!"@@ Kara says, smiling brightly. She wiggles her eyebrows at you and gives you a knowing look.

@@.ritt;"You want shotgun?"@@ Ritter asks, leaning over to pop open the passenger door.

Dave mutters, @@.dave;"Maybe, uh, Kara should take shotgun…"@@

You look around and realize, at this point, that your decision here is going to affect more than just who you sit with.

//Oh my gosh! Seriously?! They're trying to figure out who 'gets' me?!//

After another quick glance at all their faces, you know that is absolutely without a doubt what's happening here: whomever you sit with gets 'dibs' on you!

You could get in the passenger seat and [[sit next to Ritter|154_PickRitter]] or [[sit in the back with Dave|154_PickDave]] or [[sit in the back with Kara|154_PickKara]].

passages.content_zh:
你湊足了材料，為大家準備了像樣的培根、雞蛋和吐司早餐。在雞蛋上撒了點胡椒、每片吐司塗上奶油後，你朝屋裡大喊 @@.maddie;"早餐好了！"@@ 然後在小廚房餐桌旁坐下，開始吃自己那份。

Ritter走進來，穿著一條破舊有洞的牛仔褲，Kara跟在他身後進了廚房，身上還是昨晚那件連身裙——雖然現在已經皺得厲害。

[IF outfit("")]\
Ritter打量著你赤裸的身體，讚賞地朝你眨了眨眼。他轉向Kara。

@@.ritt;"入境隨俗嘛，寶貝，"@@ 他說著，一把將Kara的連身裙從頭頂脫下扔在流理台上，露出她今早根本沒穿內衣的身體。

@@.kara;"嘿！"@@ 她叫道，隨即解開胸罩釋放那對豐滿圓潤的乳房，將胸罩扔在流理台上的連身裙旁。

她拿起餐盤坐到你旁邊，伸手捏了捏你的大腿。

@@.kara;"天啊這看起來超棒，[Maddie]！"@@

Ritter拿著自己的餐盤坐在你對面，開始狼吞虎嚥。

Dave十分鐘後才終於進來，顯然剛洗過澡，還花時間抓了頭髮，換上一套新的素面藍T恤和寬鬆牛仔褲。

@@.ritt;"快點啊兄弟，菜要涼啦。"@@

Dave來回瞥了你和Kara好幾眼，才終於拿起餐盤坐到Kara對面。他塞了片培根進嘴裡，臉頰鼓脹地嚼著，眼神飄向廚房角落。
[ELSE]\
@@.ritt;"嘿，謝啦，還準備早餐！"@@

Ritter拿著自己的餐盤坐在你對面，開始狼吞虎嚥。

Kara拿起餐盤坐到你旁邊，伸手捏了捏你的大腿。

@@.kara;"天啊這看起來超棒，[Maddie]！"@@

Dave十分鐘後才終於進來，顯然剛洗過澡，還花時間抓了頭髮，換上一套新的素面藍T恤和寬鬆牛仔褲。

@@.ritt;"快點啊兄弟，菜要涼啦。"@@

Dave拿起餐盤坐到Kara對面。他塞了片培根進嘴裡，臉頰鼓脹地嚼著。
[/IF]\

[IF sa("sit_dave")]\
@@.dave;"那個，呃，我們該找點事做……"@@ Dave說道。他看起來像是在對你說話，但說話時並沒有正眼看你。

@@.kara;"我們得去個家庭聚會，但你們兩個該出去玩玩。動物園今天免費入場。或許你們可以去看看？"@@

@@.dave;"好啊，當然，動物園，"@@ Dave點頭說。@@.dave;"聽起來不錯。"@@

你聳聳肩。

//或許會有趣吧？我好久沒去動物園了……//

早餐後，你換上適合走動的休閒服裝。你和Dave下樓坐進等候的計程車，[前往動物園]。
[ELSE]\
@@.ritt;"那麼，我們有些計畫了！大家要一起去看Kara的拍攝。"@@

Kara緊張地笑了笑。@@.kara;"真的只是個小角色……"@@

@@.ritt;"告訴他們電影叫什麼名字，"@@ Ritter對她說，幾乎憋不住笑。

@@.kara;"呃……"@@ Kara咯咯笑著咬住嘴唇。@@.kara;"是，那個……《史前鮑魚制裁者》。"@@

Ritter爆出大笑，Kara用手捂住嘴，努力壓抑顯然失控的咯咯笑聲。

@@.ritt;"他們準備了超小的比基尼給她穿。我是說，真的，那玩意『超迷你』！還要她穿著它跳來跳去奔跑——天啊我等不及要看了！"@@

@@.kara;"我才不穿那套！"@@ Kara玩笑地拍打他。@@.kara;"變態！"@@ 她對你說：@@.kara;"其實我有件很得體的連身泳裝。"@@

@@.dave;"鮑魚制裁者？"@@ Dave問。@@.dave;"真的假的？"@@

@@.kara;"噢，就只是部俗氣的B級片啦，Dave！沒有真的裸露或什麼的。嗯，也許有些胸部鏡頭。"@@

@@.dave;"我以為妳來城裡是為了拍大頭照？"@@

@@.kara;"對啊，那也是。這只是，你知道，個機會嘛！"@@

Dave臉色難看但沒繼續話題。他抓起鹽罐，往雞蛋上猛撒鹽。

你最早開始吃，也最先吃完早餐，向餐桌上的眾人致意後離席準備。

//這應該會很有趣。我都不知道Kara有演電影！//

你換上休閒服裝，等其他人準備好，然後大家擠進停車場等候的計程車，[前往電影拍攝現場]。
[/IF]\

passages.name: 162_DayWithDave
passages.content: <>\ @@.dave;"So, um, what do you do? You know, for work?"@@ Dave finally asks after you two have been walking around the zoo for about half an hour. @@.maddie;"Oh, not much. I used to be a cashier at a grocery store. Wow, that seems ''so long ago''!<> I kinda work at a spa, now. I think… I don't know if I still have that job, actually.<><> And I just remembered I'm supposed to be at work right now! I just got a job at a coffee shop -- but I guess probably not anymore, since I didn't show up!<>"@@ You laugh and shrug. @@.dave;"So, like, you don't have any prospects for the future? Like, not really?"@@ @@.maddie;"I guess not?"@@ Dave takes a deep breath. He starts to say something… but then takes another deep breath. Finally, he says, @@.dave;"Look, I know I haven't been, you know… sociable."@@ //No shit…// @@.dave;"But, see, I'm leaving for my first station in a few days. See, I joined the Army a couple months ago and I just… didn't want to like… 'hit it and forget it'. You know what I mean?"@@ @@.maddie;"Um…"@@ @@.dave;"Come with me,"@@ Dave suddenly blurts out. You stop and look at him. @@.maddie;"Errrm… what?"@@ @@.dave;"I like you a lot. I know I haven't shown it. I've been acting dumb! Shit. Look, I'm headed to Vegas. That's where I'm stationed. We can get to know each other and see if… things work out. If not, I promise, I'll get you on the first plane back here. I swear it."@@ //He wants me to go to Las Vegas with him…? I JUST met this guy…// Sensing your hesitation, Dave continues, saying, @@.dave;"We'll get married -- wait, don't look at me like that! See, in the military, that'll mean they'll give us our own house on base. Paid for! And extra money for, you know, you being a dependent. You won't have to work unless you want to. C'mon. Let's just do it. You and me. Just… try it. Huh? Haven't you tried anything crazy in your life?"@@ //This is
passages.content_zh:
\
@@.dave;"所以，呃，你是做什麼的？你知道的，工作方面？"@@ 在動物園裡逛了約半小時後，Dave終於開口問道。

@@.maddie;"噢，沒什麼特別的。我以前在雜貨店當收銀員。哇，感覺那已經''好久以前''的事了！[IF sa("rejectspa","not")] 我現在算是在一間水療中心工作吧。我想……其實我不確定自己還有沒有那份工作。[/IF][IF sa("coffeejob")] 而且我剛剛才想起來，我現在本來應該在上班的！我剛在一間咖啡店找到工作——但我想大概沒了吧，畢竟我沒去報到！[/IF]"@@

你笑著聳了聳肩。

@@.dave;"所以，你對未來沒什麼規劃嗎？像是，真的沒有？"@@

@@.maddie;"我想是沒有吧？"@@

Dave深吸了一口氣。他開口想說些什麼……但又深吸了一口氣。

最後，他說道：@@.dave;"聽著，我知道我一直以來，那個……不太善於交際。"@@

//廢話……//

@@.dave;"但是，你看，我過幾天就要去第一個駐地報到了。是這樣的，我幾個月前加入了陸軍，我只是……不想那種……『上了就跑』的關係。你懂我的意思嗎？"@@

@@.maddie;"呃……"@@

@@.dave;"跟我走吧，"@@ Dave突然脫口而出。

你停下腳步看著他。

@@.maddie;"呃……什麼？"@@

@@.dave;"我很喜歡你。我知道我沒表現出來。我一直表現得很蠢！該死。聽著，我要去拉斯維加斯。那就是我的駐地。我們可以互相了解，看看……能不能成。如果不行，我保證，我會讓你搭第一班飛機回來這裡。我發誓。"@@

//他想讓我跟他一起去拉斯維加斯……？我才剛認識這傢伙……//

感覺到你的猶豫，Dave繼續說道：@@.dave;"我們會結婚——等等，別那樣看我！你看，在軍隊裡，這樣他們就會給我們基地裡的房子。免費的！還會因為你是眷屬而多領一筆津貼。你不需要工作，除非你想。來嘛。我們就這麼做吧。你和我。就……試試看。嗯？你這輩子難道沒做過任何瘋狂的事嗎？"@@

//這太瘋狂了……我竟然真的在考慮[跟Dave去拉斯維加斯]？這簡直瘋了……我應該盡可能委婉地[拒絕他]。//

passages.name: 162_DayWithEveryone
passages.content:
<<outfit $player.keepoutfit>>\
Dave takes shotgun in the cab on the drive to the movie shoot, and you, Kara, and Ritter chat in the back about Kara's role in the film. Apparently, she doesn't actually have any lines -- besides some screaming, she thinks -- and her character dies at the end of the introduction scene so she doesn't have much screen time.

@@.kara;"But I'm totally fine with it! I mean, the script gets a little raunchy toward the middle so I'm kinda glad my character will be dead before that!"@@ She shrugs and laughs.

The cab pulls up to a large lot with several warehouse-looking buildings constructed on it. A pair of security guards are attending the gate to the complex but Kara simply explains why she's there and they let everyone through.

Kara leads everyone to one of the warehouses -- it has a big number 6 on it -- and you follow her inside.

It's humid, dim, and smells like mold inside. Ahead, several large spotlights beam down onto a large stage of obviously fake grass adorned with a few plastic-looking trees and rocks.

@@.carlson;"Aha, Kara!"@@ a rotund, balding man says as he approaches your group. He's outfitted in a biege vest, baggy cargo shorts, and neon green rubber sandals. @@.carlson;"Well, you've brought friends!"@@ he says, making no effort to hide his lingering gaze up and down your body.

@@.kara;"This is my boyfriend Patrick and my good friend Dave and my new friend, <<Maddie>>,"@@ she says. @@.kara;"This is Carlson. He's the talented writer-director of the movie."@@

@@.carlson;"Any chance you can act, <<Maddie>>?"@@ he asks, eyeing you from toe to head once again.

Kara glances at you and then back to Carlson. @@.kara;"Oh! You have a role for her?"@@

The man nods. @@.carlson;"You know it! We could always use more cave babes!"@@

Kara looks over at you with raised eyebrows. @@.kara;"Hey, yeah! What do you say, <<Maddie>>? Wanna co-star?"@@ She grins at you.

@@.maddie;"Um…"@@

Carlson laughs. @@.carlson;"Well, not ''co-star'' bu
passages.content_zh:
\
前往電影拍攝現場的計程車上，Dave坐了前座，而你、Kara和Ritter在後座聊著Kara在電影中的角色。顯然，她其實沒有台詞——她覺得除了幾聲尖叫之外——而且她的角色在開場場景結束時就會死掉，所以她的戲份不多。

@@.kara;"但我完全沒問題！我是說，劇本到中間部分會有點下流，所以我還挺慶幸我的角色在那之前就會死掉！"@@ 她聳聳肩笑了。

計程車停在一大片空地前，空地上建了幾棟看起來像倉庫的建築。一對保全守著片場大門，但Kara簡單說明了來意後，他們就放所有人進去了。

Kara領著大家走向其中一間倉庫——上面有個大大的數字6——你們跟著她走進去。

裡面濕氣很重，光線昏暗，有股霉味。前方，幾盞大型聚光燈投射在一片顯然是假草皮的大型舞台上，點綴著幾棵塑膠感很重的樹和岩石。

@@.carlson;"啊哈，Kara！"@@ 一個圓胖、禿頭的男人走過來對你們說道。他穿著米色背心、寬鬆的工裝短褲和螢光綠橡膠涼鞋。@@.carlson;"喔，你還帶了朋友來！"@@ 他說著，毫不掩飾地上下打量著你的身體。

@@.kara;"這是我的男朋友Patrick、我的好朋友Dave，還有我的新朋友，[Maddie]，"@@ 她介紹道。@@.kara;"這位是Carlson。他是這部電影才華洋溢的編劇兼導演。"@@

@@.carlson;"[Maddie]，你有沒有可能演戲啊？"@@ 他問道，目光再次從你的腳掃視到頭頂。

Kara瞥了你一眼，然後看向Carlson。@@.kara;"喔！你有角色給她演嗎？"@@

男人點點頭。@@.carlson;"當然！我們永遠需要更多洞穴辣妹！"@@

Kara挑起眉毛看向你。@@.kara;"嘿，對耶！你覺得怎麼樣，[Maddie]？想一起演嗎？"@@ 她對你咧嘴一笑。

@@.maddie;"嗯……"@@

Carlson大笑。@@.carlson;"呃，不是『一起演』，更像是……配角。就像這裡的Kara一樣。別擔心，片場沒有活生生的動物或那類東西！現在都用CGI了。你只需要簽一些授權同意書，我們就可以開始了！"@@

Kara繼續對你咧嘴笑著。@@.kara;"怎麼樣？"@@

你可以[簽署同意書]和Kara一起拍電影，或是[婉拒這個提議]。

passages.name: 163_NoActing
passages.content: You shake your head. @@.maddie;"No, thanks. I'm not, like, good at acting."@@ @@.carlson;"Can't say I didn't try,"@@ Carlson says with a shrug. After about an hour of Kara running away from a hunky guy -- her in a leopard-print onepiece swimsuit and him in a leopard-print loincloth -- the director says he has all the footage he needs and releases her for the day. You, Kara, and Ritter pile into the back seat of a cab while Dave takes the front passenger seat. @@.kara;"Whew! I'm tired,"@@ Kara says. <>She snuggles against you and pulls your arm over her to nuzzle in.<> She puts her head in Ritter's lap and he puts his arm around you.<> @@.ritt;"That was interesting, huh Dave?"@@ Dave shrugs. @@.dave;"I don't think I'd ever watch that kind of movie."@@ You roll your eyes and lean your head back against the seat. //Gaaah, he's such a drag...// Everyone rides in silence as the cab takes you [[back to Ritter's apartment|180_BackToRitters]].
passages.content_zh:
你搖搖頭。@@.maddie;"不，謝了。我對演戲不太在行。"@@

@@.carlson;"至少我試過了，"@@ Carlson聳肩說道。

大約一小時後，Kara還在躲避一個肌肉男——她穿著豹紋連身泳裝，而他穿著豹紋纏腰布——導演說他已經拍夠了素材，讓她今天收工。你、Kara和Ritter擠進計程車後座，Dave則坐在前座。

@@.kara;"呼！我好累，"@@ Kara說。[IF sa("sit_kara")]她依偎著你，拉過你的手臂環抱自己，舒服地蹭了蹭。[ELSE]她把頭枕在Ritter腿上，而他則伸手摟住你。[/IF]

@@.ritt;"挺有意思的，對吧Dave？"@@

Dave聳聳肩。@@.dave;"我應該不會看那種電影。"@@

你翻了個白眼，將頭靠向座椅後方。

//天啊，他真掃興...//

計程車載著你們[返回Ritter的公寓]途中，所有人都沉默不語。

passages.name: 163_Moviestar
passages.content:
@@.maddie;"Okay, sure!"@@

@@.kara;"Yay!"@@

@@.carlson;"Great!"@@ Carlson says. @@.carlson;"I'll be right back!"@@

He rushes off and returns a few minutes later with a single piece of paper.

@@.carlson;"See? Not much to it! Just the standard stuff here,"@@ he says, handing the paper and a pen over to you.

The print on the page is tiny. You hold it close to your face and start to read it but it's difficult to focus on the little letters. The long words, stuffy language, and legalese isn't helping much either. After a few minutes it's becoming clear that everyone is becoming irritated that it's taking you so long to look over the sign the release. Carlson's frown is quickly becoming a scowl and even Kara is starting to look a bit irked.

You realize it's pointless to continue trying to read this without a magnifying glass, a dictionary, a handful of Adderall, and a few hours to kill.

//I just need to [[sign it|164_SignRelease]] or [[decline the offer|163_NoActing]] after all, I guess...//
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"好啊，沒問題！"@@

@@.kara;"太好了！"@@

@@.carlson;"太棒了！"@@ Carlson說道。@@.carlson;"我馬上回來！"@@

他匆匆離開，幾分鐘後拿著一張紙回來。

@@.carlson;"看吧？沒多少內容！只是些標準條款，"@@他說著，把紙和筆遞給你。

紙上的字體極小。你把紙湊近臉前開始閱讀，但那些小字實在難以聚焦。冗長的詞彙、迂腐的用語和法律術語更是雪上加霜。幾分鐘後，明顯能感覺到大家開始不耐煩——你審閱同意書的時間太長了。Carlson的皺眉迅速轉為怒容，連Kara也開始顯得有點惱火。

你意識到，沒有放大鏡、字典、一把Adderall藥丸和幾個小時的空閒，繼續試圖讀懂這份文件根本是徒勞。

//我想...歸根結底我只需要[簽名]或[拒絕這個機會]吧...//

passages.name: 164_SignRelease
passages.content: With a shrug, you set the paper down on a nearby table and scrawl $player.name on the signature line. //Hey, look at that! I even remembered to write my new name!// @@.carlson;"Great!"@@ Carlson says, plucking the paper from your hand. @@.carlson;"Welcome to the production! Kara, please take her to wardrobe with you. We need to get started immediately!"@@ He cackles heartily and gleefully saunters off. Dave frowns. @@.dave;"I don't know about that guy..."@@ @@.kara;"Oh, he's fine,"@@ Kara says, slapping Dave's shoulder. @@.kara;"He's just excited to have <> in the movie! Speaking of which, c'mon, let's get into our 'wardrobe!'"@@ Kara takes your head and pulls you towards the corner of the warehouse where a few folding screens are setup to block the view. On the other side of the screens sit two rolling trolleys of hanging clothes and a couple large wardrobe chests. Kara grabs a hanger that appears to have some raggy strings draped over it. She hands it over to you and you realize it's actually a leopard-print bikini. A teeny-tiny one. And what little material there is actually is, besides the thin strings, is partially see-through. //Someone would have to be ''really'' comfortable with their body to wear this!// @@.maddie;"Um...?"@@ Kara shoots you a pained smile. @@.kara;"Oh ''please'' don't make me wear that one!"@@ she says, biting her lip. @@.kara;"There's only two outfits for cave babes here that will fit us and you have a ''much'' better body than me, <>!"@@ You look at the outfit she's holding for herself: a leopard-print onepiece that is far more conservative than the bikini but still rather sexy. Then you look back to her pleading eyes and hopeful smile. @@.kara;"Pleeeeeease?"@@ she begs. <>\ //I feel bad for Kara, but I think I'd rather [[wear the onepiece|165_CavegirlOnepiece]] than [[wear the tiny bikini|165_CavegirlBikini]], right...?// <>\ //I feel bad for Kara, but there is just [
passages.content_zh:
你聳聳肩，把紙放在附近的桌上，在簽名欄潦草地寫下$player.name。

//嘿，瞧！我甚至記得寫我的新名字呢！//

@@.carlson;"太好了！"@@ Carlson說著從你手中抽走紙張。@@.carlson;"歡迎加入劇組！Kara，請帶她去服裝間。我們得立刻開工！"@@

他開懷又得意地咯咯笑著，悠哉地踱步離開。

Dave皺起眉頭。@@.dave;"我對那傢伙不太放心..."@@

@@.kara;"噢，他沒問題的，"@@ Kara說著拍了拍Dave的肩膀。@@.kara;"他只是因為[Maddie]要參演太興奮了！說到這個，來吧，我們去換『戲服』！"@@

Kara拉住你的手，把你拖向倉庫角落——那裡用幾面摺疊屏風隔出視線死角。屏風另一側擺著兩排掛滿衣服的移動衣架和幾個大型衣箱。Kara抓起一個衣架，上面看似掛著幾縷破布條。她遞給你，你才發現那其實是豹紋比基尼。一套極其微小的比基尼。而且除了細繩之外，本就不多的布料居然還是半透明的。

//得對自己身材「極度」自信的人，才敢穿這個吧！//

@@.maddie;"呃...？"@@

What a setup! Amazing! Fantastic! ''Lucrative!''"@@ @@.maddie;"Wait a--"@@ <>\ @@.carlson;"This means more screen time for you and Kara, of course! Completely credited roles, now!"@@ he says, shooting Kara a sly wink. @@.carlson;"Paid entrance into the actor's guild, full access to all the extras, and..."@@ He twiddles his fingers in the air for dramatic effect. @@.carlson;"''DIALOG!''"@@ Kara's mouth gapes open. She slaps it shut for a brief moment to ask, @@.kara;"Really?"@@ @@.carlson;"Yeeesss!"@@ Carlson trills, wiggling his fingers upwards like a bursting firework. @@.carlson;"Dialog! For the two of you! I can hear it now: you discuss the escape<>, the unfortunate loss of her only cl
passages.content_zh:
@@.carlson;"完美！"@@ Carlson 拍手說道。@@.carlson;"簡直完美！"@@

Kara 爆出一陣大笑。Dave 急忙拿著毛巾衝過來，伸直手臂遞給你。你從他手中抓過毛巾，迅速裹住自己。Ritter 緩步走來，對著你們倆咧嘴笑。

@@.carlson;"我太愛這段即興演出了！"@@ Carlson 搖搖擺擺地走向人群說道。@@.carlson;"哎呀，我自己都寫不出更好的劇本！呃，這當然不是真的，我『當然』寫得出來，但還是...非常令人印象深刻！"@@ 他捏了捏你的肩膀，對 [IF sa("kara_bmovie")]Kara[ELSE]Jaxon[/IF] 咧嘴笑。@@.carlson;"你們倆真有化學反應！我『感受』得到那種連結，在片場也看得出來！觀眾會愛死的！"@@

[IF sa("kara_bmovie")]\
Kara 看向你，挑了挑眉毛。
[ELSE]\
Jaxon 看向你，臉上掛著傻笑。
[/IF]\

[IF outfit("bmovienobikini")]\
@@.carlson;"當然，為了劇情連貫性，從現在起你得保持裸體，"@@ Carlson 平淡地說，朝你點了點頭。

@@.maddie;"呃...什麼？"@@

@@.carlson;"你的衣服在逃離 Poontang Punisher 時犧牲了！"@@ 他解釋道。@@.carlson;"這電影開頭太完美了！多棒的鋪陳！驚人！太棒了！『超有賺頭！』"@@

@@.maddie;"等等——"@@

[/IF]\
@@.carlson;"這當然意味著你和 Kara 會有更多鏡頭！現在可是完全有署名的角色了！"@@ 他說，對 Kara 狡猾地眨眨眼。@@.carlson;"有酬加入演員工會，能享用所有額外福利，還有..."@@ 他在空中扭動手指製造戲劇效果。@@.carlson;"『台詞！』"@@

Kara 張大了嘴。她猛地閉上嘴片刻，問道：@@.kara;"真的嗎？"@@

@@.carlson;"沒——錯——！"@@ Carlson 拉長音調說，手指像煙火綻放般向上扭動。@@.carlson;"台詞！給你們倆的！我現在就能想像：你們討論逃亡過程[IF outfit("bmovienobikini")]，以及她不幸失去了僅有的衣物，[ELSE]同時[/IF]在寒冷的夜晚依偎在火堆旁取暖！太精彩了！而且很容易就能轉場到一些軟調的女同志性愛戲！"@@

[IF sa("sit_kara")]\
//嗯，我當然不介意多來點她樓下的親吻！//
[ELSE]\
//等等...我和 Kara 還有『女同志』性愛！？//
[/IF]\

Dave 對他皺起眉頭。@@.dave;"那太糟糕了！"@@

所有人都看向 Dave，彷彿他剛踢了一隻小狗。

@@.ritt;"老兄，"@@ Ritter 說，把手搭在 Dave 肩上，@@.ritt;"女同志性愛是完全徹底一百八十度相反於糟糕的東西。"@@

@@.dave;"我只是說...這樣利用 [Maddie]。還有 Kara！這...不對！"@@

[IF sa("kara_bmovie")]\
Carlson 看著你和 Kara。@@.carlson;"聽著夥計，我不知道你有什麼不滿，但你剛剛『看到』那場戲了嗎？這兩人完全願意上床——如果她們還沒幹過的話！"@@

[IF sa("sit_kara")]\
@@.kara;"噢，我們『絕對』幹過了！"@@ Kara 好心地補充道。她抓住你的上臂，把你拉近依偎在你的肩頭。
[ELSE]\
@@.kara;"這個嘛，她確實上了我男朋友，所以她欠我的，"@@ Kara 說，對你眨了眨眼。
[/IF]\

Dave 聽到昨晚他可能已懷疑的事得到證實，看起來更加沮喪了。
[ELSE]\
Carlson 看著你和 Kara。@@.carlson;"聽著朋友，我不知道你有什麼不滿，但辣妹『總是』願意搞蕾絲邊！這是她們的天性，老兄！"@@

Kara 對你做了個俏皮興奮的表情並聳聳肩。

//嗯，我是說...她『確實』可愛得要命...但我不確定這樣好不好！//
[/IF]\

@@.carlson;"時間不等人！我們來準備下一場戲！"@@ Carlson 在空中轉動手指，大步走回他的導演椅。@@.carlson;"演員休息五分鐘！"@@

@@.kara;"那就是我們！演員！"@@ Kara 對你咧嘴笑。@@.kara;"現在我們是『真正』的演員了，去拿點免費零食吧！"@@

//嗯，我確實有點餓了...//

你 [握住 Kara 伸出的手] 讓她帶你去零食區。

passages.name: 171_SnackBreak
passages.content: @@.kara;"So, waddaya think?"@@ Kara asks as she shoves another cube of cheese into her bulging cheeks. @@.maddie;"I think you eat a lot of cheese."@@ @@.kara;"When it's free!"@@ She chews her mouthful, swallows, and asks, @@.kara;"I mean what do you think about the movie and all? You know, you don't have to keep doing it if you don't want to. I mean, it seems like a really great opportunity, but if you're not down with it... that's fine, you know? <>Especially now that, you know, you're expected to be naked and all. <><>But at least we get to have a little more lezzy fun, eh?<>And since we're expected to... well... lez out a little?<> I mean, it makes total sense for the movie now... but it's up to you."@@ You sigh and toss one of the cheese cubes into your mouth to munch on while you think. //Do I want to [[continue 'acting'|172_StayStar]] in the movie or should I [[quit now|172_QuitActing]] before it gets any crazier...?//
passages.content_zh:
@@.kara;"所以，你覺得怎麼樣？"@@ Kara 問道，一邊又把一塊起司塞進鼓起的臉頰。

@@.maddie;"我覺得你吃了很多起司。"@@

@@.kara;"免費的時候當然吃！"@@ 她嚼了嚼滿嘴食物，吞下後問道：@@.kara;"我是說你對電影這些事怎麼想？你知道，如果你不想繼續做，不必勉強。我是說，這看起來是個超棒的機會，但如果你不願意...也沒關係，懂嗎？[IF outfit("bmovienobikini")]尤其是現在，你知道，你得保持裸體什麼的。[/IF][IF sa("sit_kara")]但至少我們能多點蕾絲邊樂趣，對吧？[ELSE]而且既然我們得...那個...搞點蕾絲邊？[/IF] 我是說，對電影劇情來說完全合理...但還是取決於你。"@@

你嘆了口氣，丟了一塊起司到嘴裡咀嚼，一邊思考。

//我想[繼續『演』下去]這部電影，還是應該在變得更瘋狂之前[現在就退出]...？//

passages.name: 172_StayStar
passages.content: You shrug. @@.maddie;"It's fine,"@@ you say, trying to convince yourself as well as Kara. @@.maddie;"I mean... it's just acting, right?"@@ @@.kara;"Right!"@@ Kara says with a huge grin. @@.kara;"Gosh, <>, you're so confident and awesome! How did you get so be so damn cool?"@@ You snort out a laugh. @@.maddie;"Sometimes it feels like I was ''forced'' to be this way,"@@ you admit. You toss another cube of cheese into your mouth and shrug. Kara shakes her head and shrugs as well. @@.kara;"This fuckin' cheese, right? Why is it so good?!"@@ You say @@.maddie;"Ith fwee"@@ around a mouthful of cheddar. Kara laughs. @@.carlson;"Actors on set!"@@ Carlson's robotic-sounding voice barks through a megaphone. @@.carlson;"Actors back on set!"@@ The megaphone chirps and squeals with feedback. @@.carlson;"This damn thing!"@@ he shouts in his normal voice. He flings the megaphone away and the sound of it clattering to pieces echoes in the warehouse. @@.carlson;"Let's go! Get those tits and asses back on set!"@@ @@.kara;"Looks like we're on, fellow actress!"@@ she says, taking your hand in hers. @@.kara;"Let's make the magic happen!"@@ You grab one last cube of cheese as Kara ushers you [[back to the set|173_NextScene]].
passages.content_zh:
你聳聳肩。@@.maddie;"沒關係的，"@@你說道，試圖說服自己同時也說服Kara。@@.maddie;"我是說...這只是演戲，對吧？"@@

@@.kara;"沒錯！"@@Kara咧嘴大笑著說。@@.kara;"天啊，[Maddie]，你這麼有自信又超棒！你到底是怎麼變得這麼酷的？"@@

你噗哧一聲笑了出來。@@.maddie;"有時候感覺我是被『逼著』變成這樣的，"@@你坦承道。你又丟了一塊起司到嘴裡，然後聳聳肩。

Kara搖搖頭，也聳了聳肩。@@.kara;"這該死的起司，對吧？怎麼會這麼好吃？！"@@

你嘴裡塞滿切達起司含糊地說：@@.maddie;"素免錢的"@@

Kara大笑起來。

@@.carlson;"演員就位！"@@Carlson透過擴音器發出機器人般的吼聲。@@.carlson;"演員回到定位！"@@擴音器發出反饋的吱喳尖鳴聲。@@.carlson;"這鬼東西！"@@他用正常聲音吼道。他把擴音器用力扔開，摔成碎片的碰撞聲在倉庫裡迴盪。@@.carlson;"快點！把那些奶子和屁股都帶回片場！"@@

@@.kara;"看來該我們上場了，女演員夥伴！"@@她說著，握住你的手。@@.kara;"讓我們創造奇蹟吧！"@@

你趁Kara催促你[回到片場]時抓了最後一塊起司。

passages.name: 172_QuitActing
passages.content: @@.maddie;"Hmm... No, I don't think I want to do it anymore. Sorry."@@ She shrugs. @@.kara;"Hey, it's fine! I get it. I mean, this isn't exactly a high-budget operation, huh?"@@ The two of you continue to enjoy the free snacks until a loud squelch of feedback makes you both jump. @@.carlson;"Actors on set!"@@ Carlson's robotic-sounding voice barks through a megaphone. @@.carlson;"Actors back on set!"@@ The megaphone chirps and squeals with feedback. @@.carlson;"This damn thing!"@@ he shouts in his normal voice. He flings the megaphone away and the sound of it clattering to pieces echoes in the warehouse. @@.carlson;"Let's go! Get those tits and asses back on set!"@@ Kara rolls her eyes and reaches over to touch your arm. @@.kara;"Don't worry about it, I'll tell him."@@ She goes off to inform the director that you no longer want to be involved in the production. Moments later, you hear him yelling. @@.carlson;"Get your ass over here! You signed a contract!"@@ @@.maddie;"I don't want to do it anymore,"@@ you reply as you walk back over to the set. @@.carlson;"Oh no, you're not getting out of this!"@@ He holds up the piece of paper you signed earlier. @@.carlson;"You owe me no less than three full acts of vaginal penetration with an optional anal act at the director's discretion according to the aptly named 'Clause Sixty-Nine' sweetheart!"@@ <>\
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"嗯...不，我想我不繼續演了。抱歉。"@@

她聳聳肩。@@.kara;"嘿，沒關係！我懂。我是說，這畢竟不是什麼高成本製作，對吧？"@@

你們兩人繼續享用免費零食，直到一陣刺耳的反饋噪音讓你們都跳了起來。

@@.carlson;"演員就位！"@@Carlson透過擴音器發出機器人般的吼聲。@@.carlson;"演員回到定位！"@@擴音器發出反饋的吱喳尖鳴聲。@@.carlson;"這鬼東西！"@@他用正常聲音吼道。他把擴音器用力扔開，摔成碎片的碰撞聲在倉庫裡迴盪。@@.carlson;"快點！把那些奶子和屁股都帶回片場！"@@

Kara翻了個白眼，伸手碰了碰你的手臂。@@.kara;"別擔心，我會告訴他。"@@

她走去通知導演你不想再參與拍攝了。片刻後，你聽到他的吼叫聲。

@@.carlson;"給我滾過來！你簽了合約的！"@@

@@.maddie;"我不想再演了，"@@你邊走回片場邊回答。

@@.carlson;"噢不，你可別想逃！"@@他舉起你早先簽署的那張紙。@@.carlson;"根據恰如其名的『第六十九條條款』，親愛的，你至少欠我三場完整的陰道插入戲碼，外加導演可酌情決定是否增加肛交戲份！"@@

[INCLUDE: 173_NextScene2]\

passages.name: 173_NextScene
passages.content: @@.carlson;"Come on, come on!"@@ Carlson says, snapping his fingers. <>@@.carlson;"Somebody get that fuckin' towel away from her! You ''have'' to stay in character, sweetheart!"@@ A stagehand hurries by and rudely relieves you of your only coverage. You scowl at him as he scampers away with your towel, snickering to himself. <>@@.carlson;"All right, we're going to do the scene where a Poontang Punisher captures cave girl number two,"@@ he says, jabbing his finger in your direction. To Kara, he says, @@.carlson;"You'll be knocked unconcious until he's finished ravaging her and then--"@@ @@.maddie;"Wait a second!"@@ you interrupt. @@.maddie;"Ravaging me?!"@@ He rolls his eyes and shakes his head. @@.carlson;"We're not going to actually show the penetration,"@@ he explains with a huff of annoyance. @@.maddie;"Penetration?!"@@ @@.carlson;"That is what ''Poontang Punishers'' do, sweetheart!"@@ @@.maddie;"Hold on, I never agreed to--"@@ @@.carlson;"Oh yes you did,"@@ he says, holding up the piece of paper you signed earlier. @@.carlson;"The aptly named 'Clause Sixty-Nine' obligates you to no less than three full acts of vaginal penetration with an optional anal act at the director's discretion!"@@ <>\
passages.content_zh:
@@.carlson;"快點，快點！"@@Carlson打著響指說。[IF outfit("bmovienobikini")]@@.carlson;"誰去把那該死的毛巾從她身上拿掉！你『必須』保持入戲，親愛的！"@@

一名工作人員匆匆跑來，粗魯地奪走你唯一的遮蔽物。你對他怒目而視，他卻竊笑著拿著你的毛巾溜走了。

[/IF]@@.carlson;"好了，我們要拍的是『蜜穴懲罰者』俘虜二號穴居女的那場戲，"@@他說著，手指朝你的方向戳了戳。他對Kara說：@@.carlson;"你會昏迷不醒，直到他徹底蹂躪完她，然後——"@@

@@.maddie;"等一下！"@@你打斷他。@@.maddie;"蹂躪我？！"@@

他翻了個白眼搖搖頭。@@.carlson;"我們不會實際拍攝插入鏡頭，"@@他帶著惱怒的鼻息解釋道。

@@.maddie;"插入？！"@@

@@.carlson;"這就是『蜜穴懲罰者』會做的事，親愛的！"@@

@@.maddie;"等等，我從沒同意過——"@@

@@.carlson;"噢不，你同意了，"@@他說著，舉起你早先簽署的那張紙。@@.carlson;"恰如其名的『第六十九條條款』規定你至少需完成三場完整的陰道插入戲碼，外加導演可酌情決定是否增加肛交戲份！"@@

[INCLUDE: 173_NextScene2]\

passages.name: 173_NextScene2
passages.content: @@.maddie;"''What?!''"@@ Kara puts her hands on her hips and yells at him, @@.kara;"Hey, just what the hell do you think you're trying to pull here?!"@@ Surprisingly, Dave springs into action. He snatches Carlson out of his director's chair by his neck and yanks the contract away from him. @@.carlson;"That's just a copy! It's just a copy!"@@ @@.dave;"Where's the fuckin' ''contract''?!"@@ Dave demands as he shakes Carlson violently. @@.ritt;"Whoa, calm down, bro!"@@ Ritter says, waving his hands at Dave. @@.ritt;"There's no way that contract is enforceable, man."@@ @@.carlson;"It is, too!"@@ Carlson shouts, red-faced and flailing his hands ineffectively at Dave. @@.carlson;"It's legal and binding! I'll sue all of you! Let me go! I'll sue ''all'' of you!"@@ You're not sure if Carlson is telling the truth about the contract being legal and binding -- //I mean, I ''really'' doubt it!// -- but you also don't want to get anyone into trouble, including yourself. You sigh and consider your options. //Hmm... I could just [[accept the terms|174_AcceptTerms]] of the contract or [[tell him to go fuck himself|175_NoFuckingWay]].//
passages.content_zh:
@@.maddie;"''什麼？！''"@@

Kara雙手叉腰對他大吼：@@.kara;"嘿，你他媽到底想搞什麼鬼？！"@@

令人意外的是，Dave突然行動了。他一把抓住Carlson的脖子將他從導演椅上拽起來，並從他手中搶走合約。

@@.carlson;"那只是副本！只是副本而已！"@@

@@.dave;"他媽的''合約''正本在哪？！"@@ Dave一邊猛烈搖晃Carlson一邊質問。

@@.ritt;"哇，冷靜點，兄弟！"@@ Ritter對Dave揮著手說。@@.ritt;"那合約根本不可能有法律效力，老兄。"@@

@@.carlson;"當然有！"@@ Carlson滿臉通紅地尖叫，徒勞地對Dave揮舞雙手。@@.carlson;"那是合法且有約束力的！我要告你們所有人！放開我！我要告''你們全部''！"@@

你不確定Carlson說合約合法有效是不是真的——//我是說，我''真的''很懷疑！//——但你也不想惹麻煩上身，包括給自己找麻煩。你嘆了口氣，思考著選項。

//嗯...我可以直接[接受合約條款]或是[叫他滾蛋]。//

passages.name: 174_AcceptTerms
passages.content: <>\ @@.maddie;"Fine, I'll do it."@@ Everyone, including Carlson, looks at you in wide-eyed astonishment. After a few moments of stunned silence, Carlson shrugs his way out of Dave's listless grip and straightens his clothes. @@.carlson;"See? She'll do it. It's fine!"@@ Carlson clears his throat and nods. @@.carlson;"She's a professional actor, after all!"@@ @@.kara;"Are you serious?"@@ Kara asks you. You shrug. @@.maddie;"It's fine. Whatever. I mean, it's just acting, right?"@@ Kara laughs. @@.kara;"Yeah, it is!"@@ She turns to Carlson and shouts, @@.kara;"I don't want to be knocked out!"@@ Carlson frowns at her. @@.carlson;"What?"@@ @@.kara;"The Poontang Punisher will have to fuck ''both'' of us!"@@ The pudgy director looks stupefied for a moment. Then he says, @@.carlson;"Okay...?"@@ @@.ritt;"You're gonna fuck that guy?"@@ Ritter asks Kara, thumbing over to the super-jacked Jaxon. @@.kara;"Is that okay, baby?"@@ Kara asks sweetly, twisting her foot to dig her toes into the astroturf, placing her hands behind her back, and looking up at him through her eyelashes. The cutely coy act has the intended effect. Ritter huffs and says, @@.ritt;"I mean, yeah... but I'm gonna need some ''serious'' attention later to compensate for that!"@@ @@.kara;"Okay!"@@ Kara brightly agrees. Dave seems to have blown a logic fuse. He throws his arms up, defeated, and ambles away. @@.carlson;"Get that dumb motherfucker in here!"@@ Carlson shouts. @@.carlson;"Let's get this scene shot already!"@@ Jaxon is apparently the 'dumb motherfucker' in question, as one of the stagehands escorts him onto the set. @@.carlson;"You're gonna fuck both of them,"@@ he explains to the beautiful beefcake boy. @@.carlson;"Understand?"@@ Jaxon looks confused for a moment but then bobbles his head. //Well he sure doesn't ''act'' very smart...// Carlson plops into his director's chair. He directs the you and Kara to huddle up against a fake rock
passages.content_zh:
[sa: bmovie_fuckery]\
@@.maddie;"好吧，我接。"@@

在場所有人，包括Carlson，都睜大眼睛驚訝地看著你。一陣震驚的沉默後，Carlson從Dave無力的抓握中掙脫，聳了聳肩整理衣服。

@@.carlson;"看吧？她願意演。沒問題了！"@@ Carlson清了清喉嚨點頭。@@.carlson;"她畢竟是專業演員嘛！"@@

@@.kara;"你是認真的嗎？"@@ Kara問你。

你聳聳肩。@@.maddie;"沒關係。隨便啦。反正只是演戲，對吧？"@@

Kara大笑。@@.kara;"沒錯，就是演戲！"@@ 她轉向Carlson大喊：@@.kara;"我可不想被敲暈！"@@

Carlson皺眉看著她。@@.carlson;"什麼？"@@

Right?"@@ <>\ <>\ @@.matt;"She was having a tough time after my grandpa died and I helped her adjust to the nursing home."@@ <>\ <>\ @@.matt;"A job like that, you know, is pretty easy just answering phones and doing what you're told."@@ <>\ @@.toby;"Oh, okay. Least I can do for a bro that's down on his luck."@@ Better than waiting on the bus… @@.matt;"[[Okay.|002_Drive]]"@@

passages.name: 002_Drive
passages.content: You settle into his old rusted sedan's passenger seat and give him directions to your apartment. @@.toby;"Damn, livin' on the shitty side of town, bro,"@@ he says, chuckling. @@.toby;"So you remember me, right? Toby. Toby Backon, man. You were the senior they made do our freshman orientation. Remember? Super-awkward week for sure."@@ He was only three years behind me? He looks maybe twenty! Or maybe I just look older than twenty-nine… @@.matt;"Toby. Yeah. You were on the varsity swim team, right? You've gotten… taller."@@ @@.toby;"Yeah dude. And you've gotten, uh… wider?"@@ he says, laughing. @@.toby;"Ahh I'm just fuckin' with you man."@@ He's right though… @@.matt;"Yeah. Too much junk food on breaks and, you know, not exercising lately."@@ @@.toby;"That'll do it,"@@ he says, nodding enthusiastically. @@.toby;"You gotta make the time, bro."@@ After a few minutes of silence, he asks, @@.toby;"So how'd you end up, like, working at that supermarket?"@@ Times were tough, [[I made a hard decision|002_DomUp2]]. Or maybe it was more like [[I just gave up and fell into it|002_DomDown2]]?
passages.content_zh:
你坐進他那輛生鏽舊轎車的副駕駛座，告訴他你公寓的方向。

@@.toby;"靠，住在鎮上這破地方啊，兄弟，"@@ 他笑著說。@@.toby;"所以你記得我吧？Toby。Toby Backon，兄弟。你是當年學校安排帶我們新生適應的高年級生。記得嗎？那週肯定超尷尬的。"@@

他只比我小三屆？他看起來大概才二十歲！或者也許我看起來比二十九歲更老……

@@.matt;"Toby。對。你是校游泳隊的，對吧？你變得……更高了。"@@

@@.toby;"是啊，老兄。而你變得，呃……更寬了？"@@ 他大笑著說。@@.toby;"啊哈，我只是在逗你啦，兄弟。"@@

不過他說得對……

@@.matt;"是啊。休息時垃圾食品吃太多，而且，你知道的，最近都沒運動。"@@

@@.toby;"那確實會這樣，"@@ 他熱切地點頭說道。@@.toby;"你得騰出時間來鍛鍊啊，兄弟。"@@ 沉默了幾分鐘後，他問道：@@.toby;"所以你怎麼會最後在那家超市工作？"@@

那時日子很難熬，[我做了個艱難的決定]。或者也許更像是[我就這樣放棄了，隨波逐流]？

passages.name: 006_ContDrive
passages.content: @@.toby;"I hear ya, man. I hear ya."@@ The rest of the drive is spent listening to loud punk music. After exchanging numbers at the curb outside your apartment, Toby says goodbye and good luck and to give him a call if he can do anything. You trudge up the stairs to your one-bedroom apartment and find a pink paper taped to your apartment door. What… eviction?! But I paid my rent! You try your key in the lock to no avail. Knocking on the manager's office doesn't get you any response. You sigh. Okay… okay… what are my [[options?|003_Options]]
passages.content_zh:
@@.toby;"我懂，兄弟。我懂。"@@

剩下的車程都在聽震耳欲聾的龐克音樂中度過。在你公寓外的路邊交換了電話號碼後，Toby 道了別，祝你好運，並說如果有什麼他能幫上忙的就打電話給他。你拖著沉重的步伐爬上樓梯，回到你的一房公寓，發現門上貼著一張粉紅色的紙。

什麼……驅逐通知？！但我房租交了啊！

你試著用鑰匙開鎖，但沒用。敲了管理員辦公室的門也沒得到任何回應。你嘆了口氣。

好吧……好吧……我還有什麼[選擇？]

passages.name: 003_Options
passages.content: You stare blankly at the wall for a while. None. No options. I've got nothing… I've got to wait for the manager… maybe a walk will help… When you step out of your apartment building, you see Toby leaning against the trunk of his car and tapping on his cell phone. He looks up and smiles at you. @@.toby;"What's up dude, going job-hunting already?"@@ he asks. @@.toby;"That's the spirit, bro!"@@ <>\ @@.matt;"I… uh… got evicted. I don't know why or how…"@@ <>\ @@.matt;"I got evicted. Some fuckin' bullshit, man. I paid my rent and everything."@@ <>\ @@.toby;"Whoa! Dude, you are having a fuckin' fucked up day!"@@ You sigh and nod. @@.matt;"Yeah."@@ @@.toby;"Hey man, no worries! Fate or whatever has sent me to help a bro out. You can totally stay with me and my roommate until you're back on your feet. I mean, figure out this apartment shit and a job and whatever. No worries, man. Least I can do for, you know, being kind of a jerk to you sometimes in high school."@@ <>\ @@.matt;"I don't know…"@@ <>\ @@.matt;"That would be awesome. You sure, man?"@@ <>\ @@.toby;"Dude, it's totally not an issue. Hell, maybe I can get you a job at my coffee shop! Or Shaw can maybe find something for you -- he's big-time in social circles. I mean, man, are you really going to tell me to stuff it when I'm trying to be a bro?"@@ <>\ @@.matt;"No, of course not,"@@ you say, shaking your head, @@.matt;"I'm really--"@@ <>\ @@.matt;"No way, man. I really appreciate it."@@ <>\ @@.toby;"Don't worry about it! C'mon, I gotta get back but Shaw should be around and we can square it with him. [[Hop in!|004_Drive]]"@@
passages.content_zh:
你茫然地盯著牆壁好一陣子。

沒有。毫無選擇。我什麼辦法都沒有……我得等經理來……或許散個步會有幫助……

當你踏出公寓大樓時，看見Toby正靠在他的車尾箱上滑手機。他抬頭朝你笑了笑。

@@.toby;"怎麼啦兄弟，已經要去找工作了？"@@他問道。@@.toby;"這就對了嘛，兄弟！"@@

[IF tr("dominance") lt 10]\
@@.matt;"我……呃……被趕出來了。不知道為什麼或怎麼回事……"@@
[ELSE]\
@@.matt;"我被趕出來了。簡直他媽的胡扯，老兄。我房租什麼的都付清了。"@@
[/IF]\

@@.toby;"哇靠！兄弟，你今天真是他媽的衰到爆！"@@

你嘆氣點頭。@@.matt;"是啊。"@@

@@.toby;"嘿老兄，別擔心！命運還是啥的派我來幫兄弟一把。你完全可以跟我還有我室友住，直到你重新站穩腳跟。我是說，把這公寓破事跟工作什麼的搞定。別擔心，老兄。至少這是我能做的，你知道，算是為高中時有時候對你挺混蛋的補償。"@@

[IF tr("dominance") lt 10]\
@@.matt;"我不知道……"@@
[ELSE]\
@@.matt;"那太棒了。你確定嗎，老兄？"@@
[/IF]\

@@.toby;"兄弟，完全沒問題。搞不好我還能幫你在我的咖啡店找份工作！或者Shaw也許能幫你找點事——他在社交圈可是個大人物。我是說，老兄，我正想當個好兄弟，你難道真要拒絕我嗎？"@@

[IF tr("dominance") lt 10]\
@@.matt;"不，當然不是，"@@你搖著頭說，@@.matt;"我真的——"@@
[ELSE]\

@@.toby;"別放在心上！來吧，我得回去了，但Shaw應該在，我們可以跟他說清楚。[上車吧！]"@@

passages.name: 004_Drive
passages.content: He drives out of the seedy side of town into the hipster district of the city. You don't talk much as he has ska-punk blaring on the radio and is bouncing and nodding along to it as he goes well over the speed limit. He drives like a madman… Wow look at all these coffee shops and boutiques… Toby whips into a parking garage under a tall red brick building. Damn, these apartments look expensive… He leads you up the stairs -- bounding up them two at a time -- and you struggle to catch your breath when he finally stops on the seventh floor. @@.toby;"C'mon, dude,"@@ he says, waving for you to follow him down a carpeted hallway. He sticks his key into the lock of 72A and ushers you [[inside|005_Apartment]].
passages.content_zh:
他開車駛離城鎮破舊的一區，進入市裡的文青地段。你們沒怎麼交談，因為收音機正大聲播放著斯卡龐克樂，而他超速行駛的同時還隨著音樂搖頭晃腦、上下擺動。

他開車像個瘋子……哇，看看這些咖啡店和精品店……

Toby猛地把車甩進一棟高聳紅磚建築下的停車場。

靠，這些公寓看起來超貴……

他帶你上樓——兩階併作一步地跳著上去——當他終於在七樓停下來時，你氣喘吁吁地努力跟上。

@@.toby;"來吧，兄弟，"@@他說著，揮手讓你跟著他走進鋪著地毯的走廊。他將鑰匙插入72A的門鎖，示意你[進去]。

passages.content: <>\ In the apartment, a sweat-covered brown-skinned man with a razor-cut fade haircut and ridiculous muscle definition stands in his boxer-briefs. He's watching a UFC fight on a large mounted TV. He looks over at you with a tight-lipped glare. @@.toby;"Shaw, this is my bro Matt. He's having a rough day, man. And I told him it was cool if he stayed with us until his shit gets sorted."@@ Shaw shrugs. @@.shaw;"Whatever, man. Long as he makes himself useful and doesn't overstay his welcome."@@ @@.toby;"Told you it'd be cool,"@@ Toby says, giving you a punch on the shoulder. Then he walks off leaving you alone in the living room with Shaw. @@.shaw;"What shit you gotta sort out?"@@ Shaw asks, wiping sweat from his face with a gym towel. @@.matt;"Got fired and evicted just… about… an hour ago, I guess."@@ Shaw shakes his head. @@.shaw;"Damn. You're rollin' in bad luck, man. Don't bring any of your shit voodoo this way."@@ <>\ You smile weakly and shrug. He continues to wipe sweat off his well-defined muscles. \ <>\ You shrug. @@.matt;"Shit happens, man."@@ He continues to wipe sweat off his well-defined muscles. \ <>\ <>As his hand falls to his side you glimpse his impressive package outlined in his tight black boxer-briefs.<>\ Shaw frowns at you again and tilts his head back. @@.shaw;"You ''like'' what you see, Matt? I mean, you lookin' at me like a piece of meat, man. It's real impolite."@@ I am [[just impressed|006_AfterAnswerNo]] with his fitness, right? It's not like [[I am leering|006_AfterAnswerYes]]… am I?

@@.toby;"Shaw，這是我兄弟Matt。他今天過得很慘，老兄。我跟他說他可以跟我們住一陣子，等他的破事解決。"@@

Shaw聳聳肩。@@.shaw;"隨便，老兄。只要他讓自己有用處，別賴著不走就行。"@@

@@.shaw;"你有什麼破事要解決？"@@Shaw問道，用健身毛巾擦去臉上的汗。

@@.matt;"被炒魷魚又被趕出來……大概……一小時前吧，我想。"@@

Shaw搖搖頭。@@.shaw;"靠。你真是衰運當頭，老兄。別把你那套衰運巫毒帶到這兒來。"@@

他繼續擦拭他那輪廓分明的肌肉上的汗水。\

[IF tr("innocence") lt 10]當他的手垂到身側時，你瞥見他緊身黑色四角內褲下勾勒出的驚人隆起。[/IF]\

Shaw再次對你皺眉，頭向後仰。@@.shaw;"你''喜歡''你看到的嗎，Matt？我是說，你盯著我看的樣子像在看一塊肉，老兄。真的很不禮貌。"@@

我只是[對他的體態印象深刻]，對吧？又不是[我在色瞇瞇地看]……我有嗎？

passages.name: 006_AfterAnswer
passages.content: Toby strides back into the living room and pushes a bottle of beer into your hand. @@.toby;"Best way to take the edge off a shit day,"@@ he says, toasting you with his own bottle, @@.toby;"and maybe we can get Ritter to hook us up with some smoke later. That'll get you feelin' all good again!"@@ Shaw points his finger at Toby. @@.shaw;"Don't do that weed shit in here again. Smoke that shit over there. Stanks up the whole apartment."@@ @@.toby;"Yeah, man, I got it. No problem."@@ @@.shaw;"Good."@@ Shaw nods. @@.shaw;"I'm workin' the Deuce's Ex tonight. If you guys want, I can get you in."@@ @@.toby;"Fuck yeah bro!"@@ Toby says, saluting his beer at him. He slaps your shoulder. @@.toby;"Dude, that club has the hottest chicks in town!"@@ Shaw snorts and turns to go. \ <>\ @@.shaw;"Your boy's not interested in pussy,"@@ \ <>\ @@.shaw;"I don't think your boy's interested in pussy,"@@ \ <>\ he says, laughing. We got kind of a big thing going on right now and pretty soon we'll know if we're rich or, well… fucked!"@@ He laughs and taps your bottle with his. @@.toby;"[[Drink up!|007_Club]]"@@

Shaw 用手指著 Toby。@@.shaw;"別再在這裡抽那鬼玩意兒。要抽去那邊抽。整間公寓都會臭掉。"@@

passages.name: 007_Club
passages.content: The blaring nightclub music thumps hard on your ear drums and deep in your chest. Ugh… maybe had one or two… or ''three'' too many beers with Toby… You check your phone. Still no return calls from the apartment manager. <>\ Where do I sleep? Their couch? Or maybe… Shaw's room…? <>\ Where do I sleep? Their couch? <>\ Toby nudges your elbow and points to Shaw, who waves the two of you in his direction. So weird!// You finally nod as he keeps staring at you. @@.matty;"Thanks."@@ <>\ @@.ritt;"Hippie kinda vibe I'm getting from you -- I mean, not bothering with a shirt and the pit hair and all."@@ @@.shaw;"Like she got anythin' to hide."@@ <>\ Shaw slides the plate of food that was once yours over to Ritter. @@.ritt;"Oh shit, she can cook too? Well, that bumps you up a whole number on the scale, babe."@@ Shaw snorts. @@.shaw;"Yeah, all the way to a ''three''."@@ //Ouch! That kind of hurt…// Ritter nearly chokes on a piece of bacon and looks back and forth to you and Shaw. @@.ritt;"Whoa… brutal, man."@@ @@.shaw;"Eh, she knows we just fuckin' with her,"@@ Shaw says, waving a hand in dismissal. @@.shaw;"She's just one of the guys -- well, except she loves to get her some ''good hard dick''. Aint' that right, babe?"@@ //What an ''asshole'' Shaw is sometimes! I suppose I could just [[let it go|024_LetItGo]]… but maybe it's time to [[hurl an insult|024_TellOff]] right back at him?//
