@@.em;"好吧……噢……就是這樣……嗯嗯嗯……用你的嘴唇……噢對……在那個小豆豆上……噢就像那樣！"@@

你狂熱地舔舐、親吻、吸吮，並將舌頭探入她粉紅色的皺褶中，過了很長一段時間，你終於得到了你期望的反應。

Emily顫抖並呻吟著，整個身體都在發抖。

@@.em;"就是那裡-就是那裡-就是-那裡！噢該死對！對！對對對對對！"@@

她的指甲摳進她坐著的紙箱。她的雙腿顫抖並夾緊你的頭。她扭動臀部，喘息並呻吟著，然後突然發出一聲尖叫，踢動雙腳，顯然是經歷了一場全身顫慄的高潮。

在她持續了好一陣子的痙攣結束後，你溫柔地親吻她的大腿，讓她平靜下來。她抓住你一大把頭髮，將你拉起來俯向她。Emily將她的嘴唇印在你的嘴上，用她的舌頭纏繞著你的。當她終於退開時，她舔了舔嘴唇，露出得意的笑容。

@@.em;"教會你怎麼做這件事，會讓我非常開

passages.content: <>\ <>\ //I won't have to deal with my friends anymore…?// But are they really your friends? What have they done, besides apparently drug you… or whatever this is? //All right, fuck it! I'm outta here!// You step out into the hallway and let the apartment door shut behind you. Then realize too late that you should have looked for something more to wear. @@.matty;"Dangit, I don't even have ''shoes'' on!"@@ you gripe at yourself. @@.matty;"What was I thinking?!"@@ But of course when you try the knob, you find the door locked tight. //Oh great… now all I have is just// \ <>\ //this thin shirt!// <>\ //these small shorts!// <>\ //a pair of small shorts and a thin t-shirt!// <>\ After a long sigh, you decide there's no helping it and you head to the elevator. You're then in the garage in just a few minutes. There, idling right outside the elevator doors, is a yellow taxi. @@.matty;"Umm… hi?"@@ you call out to the driver. He looks over and scrutinizes you from head to toe. <>\ You tug at your t-shirt as if that would somehow lengthen it. <>\ You try to cross your arms casually to cover your torso, but it doesn't help. <>\ You fidget as his gaze wanders over your barely-clothed body. <>\ //Jeez, I must look ridiculous!// @@.nobody;"Matt?"@@ he finally asks. Seeing your look of recognition, he says, @@.nobody;"[[Get in|703]]."@@
passages.content_zh:
[highcheck]
[sa: venica_met]
//我以後再也不用應付那些朋友了…？//

但他們真的算是你的朋友嗎？除了顯然對你下藥…或不管這到底是什麼把戲之外，他們還做過什麼？

//好吧，去他的！我要離開這裡！//

你踏進走廊，讓公寓門在身後關上。隨即才遲鈍地意識到，你應該先找件更像樣的衣服穿。

@@.matty;"該死，我連『鞋子』都沒穿！"@@你對自己抱怨。@@.matty;"我剛才在想什麼啊？！"@@

但當你試著轉動門把時，果然發現門已牢牢鎖上。

//噢太好了…現在我只有// \
[IF outfit("shirt")]
//這件薄上衣！//
[ELSEIF outfit("shorts")]
//這條小短褲！//
[ELSE]
//一條小短褲和一件薄T恤！//
[/IF]

長嘆一口氣後，你明白無計可施，便走向電梯。幾分鐘後，你已身處車庫。一輛黃色計程車正停在電梯門外空轉著引擎。

@@.matty;"呃…你好？"@@你朝司機喊道。

他轉頭打量你，目光從頭到腳掃視一遍。

[IF outfit("shirt")]
你拉扯著T恤下襬，彷彿這樣就能讓它變長些。
[ELSEIF outfit("shorts")]
你試圖隨意交抱雙臂遮住上身，但毫無幫助。
[ELSE]
當他的視線游移在你幾乎衣不蔽體的身軀上時，你侷促不安地扭動著。
[/IF]

//天啊，我看起來一定很可笑！//

@@.nobody;"Matt？"@@他終於開口。見你露出認出他的神情，他說：@@.nobody;"[上車]。"@@

passages.content:
<<highcheck>>\
<<sa "venica_met">>\
You clamor into the back of the taxi and he takes off out of the parking lot.

The cabbie carries you along in silence except to yell expletives out the window at other drivers now and again. Nearly an hour later, the cab stops at the end of a long dirt driveway at the edge of town.

@@.nobody;"Ask for Venica. Tell her you are Matt,"@@ he says.

You pop open the door and look at him through the rearview mirror.

@@.matty;"What do--"@@

@@.nobody;"Get out,"@@ he orders.

//Oookaay… I guess I better [[get out|703out]] of the cab…//
passages.content_zh:
[highcheck]
[sa: venica_met]
你慌忙爬進計程車後座，他隨即駛離停車場。

除了偶爾搖下車窗對其他駕駛飆罵髒話外，司機一路沉默地載著你前行。近一小時後，計程車停在城郊一條長長碎石車道的盡頭。

@@.nobody;"找Venica。告訴她你是Matt。"@@他說道。

你推開車門，透過後照鏡看向他。

@@.matty;"什麼意——"@@

@@.nobody;"下車。"@@他命令道。

//好…好吧…我想我最好[下車]離開計程車…//

passages.name: 703out
passages.content: You slide out of the taxi and close the door behind you. He speeds away, leaving you standing barefooted on the gravely driveway leading up to an old square building. With nothing else to do, you gingerly step toward the building, careful not to jab your tender feet on any sharp rocks along the way. The rotund bouncer at the door glares at you as you approach. @@.nobody;"Sorry, missy,"@@ he says, his tone having nothing 'sorry' about it, @@.nobody;"but this ain't the place for you. Best just move along."@@ He sucks his teeth and stares at you, waiting for you to say something. @@.matty;"Um… I'm here to see Venica. I'm Matt."@@ The bouncer frowns but pivots like a big fat door and jerks his head for you to go in. You enter the bar to find it mostly empty -- //No surprise given the time of day.// The bartender -- a rugged underwear model sort of attractive man -- looks up from drying a glass and points to a door off to the left behind the bar. @@.harlen;"In there and first door on your left,"@@ he says. You continue along, pushing through the door he indicated, and then you open the first door on the left and step inside. Behind a large desk sits an attractive woman with sharp features: long pointed eyebrows, an acute nose, and a dangerously edgy smile. She has shoulder-length reddish hair and piercing green eyes. @@.venica;"Matt,"@@ she says, smiling a sharp-but-soft smile. @@.venica;"I'm Venica. It's nice to meet you! Sit down."@@ She indicates the chair in front of her desk. You do as requested. She leans forward on her elbows and gazes at you. @@.venica;"Oooh howdy! You're a very pretty boy, aren't you? Tell me, Matt, where you this pretty… ''before''?"@@ @@.matty;"Well… no, not really…"@@ you quietly admit. @@.matty;"Not at all, actually."@@ Venica grins. @@.venica;"Ain't that awesome!"@@ She slaps her hand on her desk, making you jump, and laughs heartily. @@.venica;"Ain't that just ''awesome''?"@@ //[[What is going on|704]] here?//
passages.content_zh:
你滑出計程車，順手關上車門。他疾馳而去，留你赤腳站在通往一棟老舊方形建築的碎石車道上。別無選擇，你只能小心翼翼地朝建築物走去，一路謹慎避免柔嫩的腳底被尖銳石塊刺傷。

門口的圓胖保鑣在你走近時瞪視著你。

@@.nobody;"抱歉啦，小妞，"@@他說道，語氣裡毫無歉意，@@.nobody;"但這兒不適合你。最好趕緊離開。"@@

他嘖了一聲，盯著你等待回應。

@@.matty;"嗯…我來找Venica。我是Matt。"@@

保鑣皺起眉頭，但像扇厚重的大門般轉過身，猛然甩頭示意你進去。

進入酒吧後，你發現裡面幾乎空無一人——//以這個時間點來說並不意外。//酒保——一個粗獷如內衣模特兒的帥氣男人——從擦拭玻璃杯的動作中抬起頭，指向吧檯後方左側的一扇門。

@@.harlen;"進去後左邊第一扇門。"@@他說道。

你依言前行，推開他指示的那扇門，接著打開左側第一扇門踏進房間。

一張大辦公桌後坐著一位五官銳利的迷人女性：細長的尖眉、高挺的鼻樑，以及帶著危險鋒芒的微笑。她留著及肩紅髮，雙眼是銳利的碧綠色。

@@.venica;"Matt，"@@她說道，露出尖銳卻柔和的微笑。@@.venica;"我是Venica。很高興見到你！請坐。"@@她指向桌前的椅子。

你依言坐下。她手肘撐著桌面向前傾身，凝視著你。

@@.venica;"哎呦喂！你真是個非常漂亮的男孩呢，對吧？告訴我，Matt，你這份美貌是…『以前』就有的嗎？"@@

@@.matty;"這個嘛…不，不算有…"@@你輕聲承認。@@.matty;"其實一點也不。"@@

Venica咧嘴笑了。@@.venica;"這不超棒的嗎！"@@她猛然拍桌，嚇得你跳起來，自己則開懷大笑。@@.venica;"這不就『棒透了』？"@@

//這到底[是怎麼回事]？//

passages.content: @@.matty;"Can I ask what's going on?"@@ @@.venica;"Well, sure! ''Sure'' you can!"@@ She jumps up from her seat and circles around behind you. Squeezing your shoulders in her hands, she says, @@.venica;"Matt, you are my property. You belong to me. That's what's going on."@@ //I'm her ''property''? What the fuck…?// You turn your head to look up at her. @@.venica;"Oh, I know,"@@ she says with a sigh as she continues massaging your shoulders, @@.venica;"I'm sure it's a hell of a thing to find out you actually ''belong'' to someone else, but that's the fact of this situation. So I'd suggest you just accept that so we can move on from there."@@ @@.matty;"But--"@@ @@.venica;"Look, here's the deal,"@@ she says, stepping back around you to sit on the edge of her desk and look down at you. @@.venica;"I bankrolled you. I paid for you. Understand? This whole… thing."@@ She waves her hand up and down, indicating your body. @@.venica;"And when you pay for something, you ''own'' it. That's only fair, right?"@@ @@.matty;"But I didn't ask--"@@ @@.venica;"Oh, I know that!"@@ she says, smiling. @@.venica;"That's perfectly clear, between me and you, that you didn't ask for any of this. And I ''do'' respect that. I really do. Honestly, I want you to know that. But it doesn't change the facts. A dog, a cat, a hamster: they don't ask to be bought. They just… get bought. Right?"@@ You frown. //She's comparing me to a ''hamster''?!// @@.venica;"Okay, okay,"@@ she says, laughing. @@.venica;"That was a bad analogy! I'm just trying to make you see clear, is all. Me and you, we have to come to an agreement on this little issue so we can move on. There's lots to do! So, waddaya say, Matt? With the understanding, of course, that you didn't ask for anything of this, can we just agree, for now, that I own you? Hmm?"@@ She holds her palms up and shrugs, looking at you for your answer. //She really wants me to agree that [[she owns me|705y]]? She
passages.content_zh:
@@.matty;"我能問問這是怎麼回事嗎？"@@

@@.venica;"嗯，當然！你『當然』可以問！"@@她從座位上跳起來，繞到你身後。她雙手按著你的肩膀說：@@.venica;"Matt，你是我的財產。你屬於我。這就是目前的狀況。"@@

//我是她的「財產」？搞什麼鬼…？//

你轉過頭仰視她。

@@.venica;"噢，我明白，"@@她嘆了口氣，繼續按摩你的肩膀，@@.venica;"我敢說發現自己真的『屬於』別人，肯定是件天大的事，但這就是現實。所以我建議你接受這個事實，我們才能繼續往下走。"@@

@@.matty;"可是——"@@

@@.venica;"聽著，事情是這樣的，"@@她說著，繞回你面前，坐在桌沿俯視你。@@.venica;"我資助了你。我為你付了錢。明白嗎？這整個……東西。"@@她上下揮手，示意你的身體。@@.venica;"當你為某樣東西付錢，你就『擁有』它。這很公平，對吧？"@@

@@.matty;"但我沒有要求——"@@

@@.venica;"噢，這我知道！"@@她微笑著說。@@.venica;"你我之間很清楚，你從未要求過這一切。而我『確實』尊重這點。真的。說實話，我希望你明白這點。但這改變不了事實。狗、貓、倉鼠：牠們不會要求被買下。牠們只是……被買下。對吧？"@@

你皺起眉頭。//她把我比作「倉鼠」？！//

@@.venica;"好啦，好啦，"@@她笑著說。@@.venica;"這比喻不好！我只是想讓你明白，就這樣。你和我，我們得在這個小問題上達成共識，才能繼續下去。還有很多事要做呢！所以，你怎麼說，Matt？當然，我們都理解你從未要求過這一切，但現在我們能不能先同意，我擁有你？嗯？"@@

她攤開手掌聳聳肩，看著你等待回答。

//她真的想讓我同意[她擁有我]？她可能為……不管這是什麼……付了錢……但[她並不擁有我]！//

passages.name: 705n
passages.content: @@.matty;"No. Nobody owns me."@@ You cross your arms and frown at her. @@.matty;"I thought I got out of the same sort of bad situation by coming here. I guess not!"@@ She sighs. @@.venica;"There ain't nothin' bad about your situation here. I'm only askin' you to do the courtesy of respecting my investment. And for me, that means you accepting the ''fact'' that I own you. Again, with the complete understanding between us that you didn't ask for any of this."@@ @@.matty;"You understanding that I didn't ask for this doesn't mean anything at all if you're going to say you own me! Why the hell out that even ''matter''?"@@ @@.venica;"Because it's important that we both understand that it this wasn't your choice,"@@ she explains. @@.venica;"If it was your choice, we'd be having a different conversation."@@ @@.matty;"Are you trying to intimidate me?"@@ @@.venica;"Why would I do that? Look, Matt, I'm only asking you for this as a gesture of goodwill from ''you'' to ''me''. Hell, I'm not making you sign anything, am I? No! This is just between ''you'' and ''me''. It's an understanding we need to have so that we can move forward. So I'm going to ask you just one more time to agree that you are my investment and I therefore own you. That's all. Simple as that. Don't work it up in your head to be anymore complicated. Just stop being so stubborn and accept the fact so that I can help you."@@ @@.matty;"Maybe I don't want your help."@@ @@.venica;"Maybe you don't,"@@ she says, shrugging, @@.venica;"but let's be real, Matt: you ''need'' my help."@@ //Fine, whatever! I agree that [[she owns me|705y]]. Or… no, you know what? I don't care what she says, [[she doesn't own me|705n2]]!//
passages.content_zh:
@@.matty;"不。沒有人擁有我。"@@你雙臂交叉，對她皺眉。@@.matty;"我還以為來這裡就能擺脫那種糟糕的處境。看來我想錯了！"@@

她嘆了口氣。@@.venica;"你在這裡的處境一點也不糟糕。我只是請你出於禮貌，尊重我的投資。對我來說，這意味著你要接受我擁有你的『事實』。再說一次，我們之間完全理解你從未要求過這一切。"@@

@@.matty;"你理解我沒要求過這些，但如果你還要說你擁有我，那根本毫無意義！這到底有什麼『關係』？"@@

@@.venica;"因為我們雙方都理解這不是你的選擇，這很重要，"@@她解釋道。@@.venica;"如果這是你的選擇，我們現在的對話就會不同了。"@@

@@.matty;"你想恐嚇我嗎？"@@

@@.venica;"我為什麼要那樣做？聽著，Matt，我只是要求你作為『你』對『我』的一種善意表示。天啊，我又沒要你簽什麼文件，對吧？沒有！這只是『你』和『我』之間的事。這是我們需要達成的理解，才能繼續前進。所以我再問你最後一次，請你同意你是我的投資，因此我擁有你。就這樣。就這麼簡單。別在腦子裡把它想得太複雜。別再這麼固執，接受事實，我才能幫助你。"@@

@@.matty;"也許我不想要你的幫助。"@@

@@.venica;"也許你不想，"@@她聳聳肩說，@@.venica;"但現實點吧，Matt：你『需要』我的幫助。"@@

//好吧，隨便！我同意[她擁有我]。或者……不，你知道嗎？我不在乎她說什麼，[她並不擁有我]！//

passages.name: 705n2
passages.content: @@.matty;"No."@@ Venica takes a deep breath and sighs it out. @@.venica;"All right. All right, Matt."@@ She walks around her desk and drops back into her chair behind it. @@.venica;"This is the part where I tell you that you owe me fifty thousand dollars. You benefited from my investment, whether you ''wanted to'' or ''not'', and so you're liable for the expenditure."@@ @@.matty;"Well that's not fair!"@@ @@.venica;"Yeah yeah,"@@ she says, waving off your argument. @@.venica;"Fairness ain't got nothing to do with it. This is solely a financial situation now."@@ She leans forward on her elbows and tents her fingers together. @@.venica;"So when might I expect to have my money back? With interest, of course. Seventeen point five percent -- which you really ought to know is a very generous rate! -- on top of the fifty kay makes fifty-eight thousand seven hundred and fifty dollars."@@ @@.matty;"I don't have that kind of money!"@@ @@.venica;"We can work out an installment plan,"@@ she says, nodding. @@.venica;"Compound interest applies, of course."@@ You grit your teeth and scowl at her. @@.matty;"This is blackmail!"@@ She scoffs. @@.venica;"How is it blackmail if you actually owe it? That doesn't make any sense, Matt! And, by the way, maybe you ought to watch your fuckin' tone with me since you've decided we ain't gonna be friends about this."@@ @@.matty;"All I decided was that you didn't own me!"@@ She shrugs and makes a face as if to imply they were both the same thing. @@.venica;"Anyway, your payments will be due at the end of every month. Let's see... four thousand eight hundred and ninety-five and some change... let's say twenty-two percent for the installment plan... takes it to... let's say six thousand a month."@@ @@.matty;"That's absurd!"@@ @@.venica;"Borrowing in this economy is expensive, Matt."@@ She stands up and walks to the office door to open it. @@.venica;"You may go now."@@ You stand up and look at her. @@.matty;"This
passages.content_zh:
@@.matty;"不要。"@@

Venica 深吸一口氣，長嘆一聲。

@@.venica;"好吧。好吧，Matt。"@@ 她繞過辦公桌，坐回後方的椅子上。@@.venica;"現在我要告訴你，你欠我五萬美元。你從我的投資中獲益了，不管你『願意』還是『不願意』，所以你必須承擔這筆支出。"@@

@@.matty;"這不公平！"@@

@@.venica;"是是是，"@@她揮手駁回你的抗議。@@.venica;"公平與這事無關。現在這純粹是財務問題。"@@她用手肘撐著身體前傾，十指交扣成塔狀。@@.venica;"那麼，我何時能拿回我的錢？當然要加上利息。百分之十七點五——你該知道這利率非常優厚！——五萬本金加上利息總共是五萬八千七百五十美元。"@@

@@.matty;"我沒有那麼多錢！"@@

@@.venica;"我們可以擬定分期付款計畫，"@@她點頭說道。@@.venica;"當然，複利照算。"@@

你咬緊牙關，怒視著她。@@.matty;"這是勒索！"@@

她嗤之以鼻。@@.venica;"如果你真的欠錢，怎麼能叫勒索？這根本說不通，Matt！還有，順便提醒你，既然你決定我們不要當朋友來處理這事，你他媽的說話語氣最好注意點。"@@

@@.matty;"我只是決定你不擁有我！"@@

她聳聳肩，做了個表情，彷彿暗示這兩者是一回事。

@@.venica;"總之，你的款項每個月底到期。我算算……四千八百九十五塊再加點零頭……分期付款計畫算百分之二十二利率的話……總共是……就說每月六千塊吧。"@@

@@.matty;"太荒謬了！"@@

@@.venica;"在這種經濟環境下借錢很貴的，Matt。"@@她站起身，走到辦公室門口打開門。@@.venica;"你可以走了。"@@

你站起來看著她。

@@.matty;"這真的不公平……"@@

@@.venica;"我知道，"@@她說著，微微皺眉。

一陣恐慌襲來，你感到下唇在顫抖。

@@.matty;"我該怎麼辦？"@@

她聳聳肩。@@.venica;"我不知道。但你最好想辦法解決。"@@

@@.matty;"你……你會殺了我嗎……？"@@

passages.content:
Just as you cross the threshold of the door, Venica clutches your shoulder and yanks you back into the office. She slams the door shut and laughs at you.

You were duped into this whole mess by those asshole friends of yours -- 'friends', hah!"@@ She takes your upper arms in her hands and guides you back to the seat in front of her desk. She sits you down and pats your head. @@.venica;"I would have to be a real heartless cunt to dump all this on you after what's happened to you, wouldn't I?"@@

You gulp and nod.

She sits on the edge of her desk again and looks down at you.

@@.venica;"Now are you ready to just agree to the whole stupid 'owned' thing so we can be friends about this? Please? For me, Matt? Just to show me that you and I can work this out together?"@@

You swallow against your dry throat.

passages.name: 715_Training
passages.content:
For the next hour, Harlen shows you how to perform your duties as a barback. He's all business at first, but during the last fifteen minutes or so he's started to show a little personality -- and surprisingly, he seems like a genuine gentleman. He doesn't make a single comment about your outfit, as suggestive as it is, and he's calm and patient with your learning and asking questions.

Feeling confident and even excited about your new job now, you reach up and give Harlen a high-five when he presents his hand.

@@.harlen;"You catch on real quick, <<Maddie>>,"@@ he says, a bit of a smile tugging at the corner of his lips. @@.harlen;"You got good energy. I think you're gonna do just fine."@@

@@.matty;"Thanks!"@@

He nods. @@.harlen;"Well, we got a little time before the bar starts to get busy. You have any questions or anything?"@@

You can't think of any relevant questions as you're convinced you're ready for any of the tasks he's explained to you.

passages.name: 999_EndDaveMarries
passages.content:
''EPILOGUE''

While the drive to Las Vegas is pretty boring -- //This music is so laaaame…// -- Dave keeps your spirits up with promises that all sorts of opportunities will open up for you in Nevada.

Vegas marriages are swift and efficient -- except Dave wants to say vows and sweetly pines about your future together, finally ending his speech with a peck on your lips.

//He really is a sweet guy. But is this… love?//

There's a lot of paperwork to fill out as a new wife of a military member. But soon the two of you are assigned a house on base and it's cosy, if not a little dated.

//Ugh but it's so HOT and UGLY here in Nevada!//

Sex with Dave is… nice. And he tells you everyday how beautiful you are and how lucky he is. He's completely devoted to you: doting on you, buying you gifts, always making an effort to make you smile. Which does work, more often than not.

Then he gets deployed for six months. You two have a teary goodbye and you promise to write him daily. In this moment, you think… //maybe I really do love him…?//

A few days later you're out to fetch the mail, just rushing out in your skin-tight little yoga outfit, and you notice your new neighbor staring at you as he mows his lawn. He's not wearing a shirt and his muscled chest and arms glisten with sweat. He smirks at you with hungry eyes, completely unashamed of his lust. In that gaze of his is the vow to make you scream his name.

You bite your lip. //Am I a good girl…?//

@@.notice;
<<heart "// A Soldier's (Not So) Lonely Wife //">>
@@
passages.content_zh:
''尾聲''

儘管開車前往拉斯維加斯的路上相當無聊——//這音樂真是有夠老土……//——Dave不斷保證內華達州將為你開啟各種機會，以此提振你的精神。

拉斯維加斯的婚禮迅速而有效率——只不過Dave想要宣讀誓言，並甜蜜地憧憬你們共同的未來，最後以輕吻你的嘴唇結束他的演說。

//他真是個溫柔的人。但這……是愛嗎？//

作為一名軍人的新婚妻子，有大量文書工作要填寫。但很快你們倆就被分配到一棟基地內的房子，雖然有點過時，但很舒適。

//呃，可是內華達這裡又熱又醜！//

與Dave的性愛……還不錯。而且他每天都告訴你，你有多美，他有多幸運。他完全忠誠於你：寵愛你、買禮物給你，總是努力讓你微笑。而這招通常也確實奏效。

然後他被派遣駐外六個月。你們倆含淚道別，你承諾每天寫信給他。在這一刻，你想……//也許我真的愛他……？//

幾天後，你出門取信，只匆匆套上緊身的小瑜伽服，你注意到你的新鄰居在修剪草坪時正盯著你看。他沒穿上衣，肌肉結實的胸膛和手臂因汗水而閃閃發亮。他帶著飢渴的眼神對你咧嘴一笑，對自己的慾望毫不羞恥。在他的凝視中，蘊含著要讓你喊出他名字的誓言。

你咬著嘴唇。//我是個好女孩嗎……？//

@@.notice;
[heart: // 軍人的（不那麼）寂寞妻子 //]
@@

passages.name: 115_TobyGE
passages.content:
''EPILOGUE''

Convincing Shaw to return to Doug's house with you is easy enough now that Toby (and by extension Emily) are on your side. Once Shaw is relieved of his body and you are relieved of Doug's poison, everything seems to wrap up nicely indeed.

New Shaw quickly moves out of the apartment and Emily takes his room. She treats you a lot better now and you're starting to think the two of you may actually become friends.

As it turns out, Toby makes for a dedicated and very caring boyfriend. He moves you into his room and even quits his online guild to spend time with you instead.

But as it also soon turns out, exclusivity isn't a concern for him -- in fact, he finally confesses in a round-about way that he gets off on the idea that you'll cuckold him by fucking other men.

Emily is, of course, excited by the development that the two of you may prove more entertaining than she could have ever expected.

In fact, Toby invites over two very handsome young men for some drinks and cards the very night he gifts you with a pair of lacy panties and a revealing babydoll top. You, being the dutiful girlfriend, wear his thoughtful gift and serve drinks to the group as they play poker. The guys eye you openly and you can see that Toby is getting excited about having his kink satisfied tonight.

//…and, hey, maybe that's my kink too?//

<<heart "// A Very 'Open' Relationship //">>
@@

@@.toby;"我們明天會去找Doug，他能跟你解釋得比我們更清楚。是他……把你搞成這樣的。他對這一切瞭如指掌。但他也會試著騙你。他會對你說謊。我不會告訴你該相信什麼，但你了解我。我這人是有點混蛋，但我絕不會出賣兄弟。『絕不』。"@@

@@.shaw;"我是個混帳，但我他媽從不說謊。Doug那個狗娘養的坑了我們所有人。記住這點。"@@

@@.toby;"Matt…[Maddie]…你相信我，對吧？"@@Toby問道。@@.toby;"你知道我當時是想幫你的，對吧？"@@

//要說[相信]很容易，但或許我對這一切[感到擔憂]？//

passages.name: 036_Trusted
passages.content:
<<re "toby">>\
You nod. @@.matty;"Yes."@@

Toby smiles. @@.toby;"Thank you, <<Maddie>>. That means a lot to me."@@

@@.shaw;"I don't give a fuck if you trust me,"@@ Shaw says, @@.shaw;"but you know I've been straight with you every step of the fuckin' way."@@

@@.toby;"Maybe you don't seem to find anything to worry about right now but that's because of the endo-whatevers fuckin' with your brain. According to Doug, those are going to wear off soon -- maybe before you meet him. So both Shaw and I want to make sure you're taken care of, ya know? We don't want you freakin' out."@@

@@.shaw;"If you do start freakin' the fuck out, you better talk to us. Understand?"@@

You nod to Shaw.

<<include "037_YouShouldKnow">>\
passages.content_zh:
[re: toby]\
你點點頭。@@.matty;"我相信。"@@

Toby笑了。@@.toby;"謝謝你，[Maddie]。這對我意義重大。"@@

@@.shaw;"我才不在乎你信不信我，"@@Shaw說，@@.shaw;"但你知道我他媽從頭到尾都對你坦誠相待。"@@

@@.toby;"也許你現在覺得沒什麼好擔心的，但那是因為那些內分泌什麼的鬼東西在影響你的腦子。據Doug說，那些效果很快就會消退——可能在你見到他之前就會。所以我和Shaw都想確保你有人照顧，懂嗎？我們不想讓你驚慌失措。"@@

@@.shaw;"要是你真他媽開始慌起來，最好找我們談。明白嗎？"@@

你對Shaw點點頭。

passages.name: 038_Bathroom
passages.content: <>\ Once inside the bathroom, you shut the door and hold out the two vials in front of you in your palms. The liquid inside them is thick and goopy-looking. //Am I going to drink one of these? I feel… nervous… The endo-thingies Toby talked about must be wearing off!// You look at yourself in the mirror. //Oh gosh… I don't even recognize me at all! There's no ''Matt'' left… only ''<>''.// You set the vials aside and pull your clothing off, tossing it on the counter. Standing on your tip-toes, you try to see your body by leaning over the sink. //I'm a girl. This is a girl body. I have boobies!// They are small -- just swollen little mounds on your chest -- but they are definitely boobies. Your gumdrop nipples and pinkish areola are undeniably womanly. You feel your little cock swelling up just looking at them: cute little bare-naked titties. You step back from the mirror and cup them in your hands, giving them a little squeeze. //Oooh, okaaay… ''that'' feels pretty nice…// Your nipples stiffen as you massage your modest mounds. //Oh, jeez! First set of tits I get my hands on and they're mine…// Looking down, you see your little two-inch erection poking out from your groin. //Poor little guy keeps getting smaller and smaller… soon I guess he'll be gone… forever?// You sigh and shake the thoughts out of your head. //I'll start freaking out if I don't stay focused!// You pick up the vials in your fingers and swirl the liquid around in them.

You sigh and head to the kitchen. After rooting around in the refrigerator and cabinets, you tap your finger on your lip while you try to make a decision.

//[[Macaroni and cheese|042_Macncheese]] would be really easy but Shaw wouldn't like that… I could make [[some spaghetti|042_Spaghetti]] with that pasta meat-sauce in the 'fridge… or I could make [[a healthy salad|042_Salad]] with all those vegetables and spinach leaves but Toby sure doesn't seem like a salad type of guy.//

Boil water. Toss in noodles. Wait. Drain. Toss in cheese powder and some milk. Stir stir stir. Done! Taste…

You make four bowls and set them at the table. The guys wander in to eat, like docile animals at feeding time.

@@.shaw;"You really like pushin' my buttons, don't ya?"@@ Shaw gets a protein shake from the refrigerator and sits down with it, pushing his bowl aside.

@@.toby;"I fuckin' love this stuff,"@@ Toby says, sitting down and immediately stuffing a forkful of yellow-orange pasta in his mouth.

You sit down to your own bowl and don't realize how hungry you were until it's empty.

After thoroughly reading the instructions for the oatmeal, you add the oatmeal to the water before bringing it to a boil for creamier oats. You reduce it to a simmer and stir in honey and cinnamon. When the oatmeal is thickened you add some milk and a couple handfuls of halved blueberries.

//Mmmhmm this looks tasty!//

Satisfied with the results, you portion out the cooked oatmeal in some bowls and add a piece of buttered toast on the side of each. After placing the filled bowls on the table you take a spoon of yours.

//Oh yeeeah! That is ''delicious''! <<Maddie>>, you are a culinary genius!//

You quickly finish your own portion -- it's not difficult, given how tasty it is -- so that you can get the dishes soaking in the sink. You happily hum to yourself as you scrub a pot, belly nice and full and excited for the guys to try their oatmeal.

<<if sa("shaw_sweetfuck")>>\
Shaw sneaks a quick grope of your naked ass as he steps by you to sit down. You look over your shoulder with a little smirk but he's acting like nothing happened. He nods along as Toby talks to him about Doug.
<<else>>\
You're grinning over your oatmeal as the guys walk in to sit down, mid-conversation.
<<endif>>\

@@.toby;"Right on. Hey, <<Maddie>>, you're coming too."@@

//At least I'll finally get out of this apartment. I think I'm starting to get cabin fever!//

@@.shaw;"Well fuck me!"@@ Shaw says, beaming a smile at you. @@.shaw;"Damn, girl, this is the best motherfuckin' oatmeal I ever hard."@@

仔細讀完燕麥片的說明後，你在水煮沸前先加入燕麥片，這樣能煮出更綿密的口感。你轉成小火慢煮，加入蜂蜜和肉桂攪拌。當燕麥片變得濃稠時，你加入一些牛奶和幾把對半切開的藍莓。

//嗯哼～這看起來真美味！//

你對成果很滿意，將煮好的燕麥片分裝到幾個碗裡，每碗旁邊再放上一片塗了奶油的吐司。把裝滿的碗放到桌上後，你嚐了一匙自己的那份。

//噢耶～這「超好吃」！[Maddie]，你真是個烹飪天才！//

你很快吃完自己那份——這麼美味，一點都不難——然後把碗盤泡進水槽。你一邊刷洗鍋子，一邊愉快地哼著歌，肚子飽足又滿足，還很期待讓大夥兒嚐嚐你的燕麥片。

[IF sa("shaw_sweetfuck")]\
Shaw 走過你身邊要去坐下時，偷偷快速摸了一把你的光裸屁股。你轉頭瞥了他一眼，嘴角帶著一絲壞笑，但他裝作沒事發生。Toby 跟他談論 Doug 時，他點頭附和。
[ELSE]\
當大夥兒走進來坐下時，你正對著自己的燕麥片咧嘴笑，他們還在繼續交談。
[/IF]\

@@.toby;"真的得搞定他，老兄。他又在搞那套，讓人很難判斷他是不是在威脅我——但他「絕對」就是在威脅我。"@@

@@.shaw;"操。好吧。去他的。再拖下去也沒用。我們吃完早餐就去開你哥們的車，然後過去。"@@

@@.toby;"太好了。嘿，[Maddie]，你也一起來。"@@

//至少我終於能離開這間公寓了。我覺得我開始有幽居煩躁症了！//

@@.shaw;"哇靠！"@@ Shaw 說道，對你綻開笑容。@@.shaw;"該死，妹子，這是我他媽吃過最讚的燕麥片。"@@

Toby 吃了一口。@@.toby;"哇，這「真的」好吃。見鬼，我本來還以為我不喜歡燕麥片呢！"@@ 他又塞了滿滿一大匙進嘴裡。

你咯咯笑了起來，隨即意識到，趕緊捂住嘴，聳了聳肩。

[ELSE]\
Emily 現在穿著另一件蕾絲上衣和一條小短褲，滑進空位子，舀了一匙燕麥片。她對你挑起一邊眉毛，露出一個小小的微笑，然後繼續吃。

[/IF]\
[/IF]\
大家很快就吃完早餐。你收拾桌上的碗盤和餐具，放進水槽。

@@.toby;"好了，我們得馬上出發。[Maddie]，快點把碗盤洗好，然後去換衣服準備去 Doug 家，好嗎？幾分鐘後就要走了。"@@

Shaw 在廚房逗留，直到其他人都離開。他滑到你正後方，雙手握住你的臀部。你能透過他的四角內褲感覺到他的勃起正頂著你的背。他親了親你的頭頂，然後給自己倒了杯咖啡，臨走前又告別式地摸了一把你的屁股才離開廚房。

//噢，他真是隻又大又傻的熊！//

[/IF]\
你以破紀錄的速度洗完碗盤，把它們放在瀝水架上滴乾。

//我想我最好[去浴室]換衣服了。//

passages.name: 062_Bathroom
passages.content:
<<outfit $player.keepoutfit>>\
You find last night's outfit folded neatly on the bathroom counter where you left it and get dressed. After a quick check of your makeup, you flip off the light and head back to the living room.

Toby and Shaw are already dressed in shirts and gym shorts in the living room.

@@.toby;"Let's go,"@@ Toby says, jerking his head for you to follow.

Emily shuts the apartment door behind Shaw, leaving the three of you to [[head over to Ritter's place|063_Ritters]].

\
你發現昨晚的衣物整齊疊放在浴室檯面上，就在你原來放的位置。你穿上衣服，快速檢查一下妝容後，關掉燈回到客廳。

Toby 和 Shaw 已經換好運動衫和短褲在客廳等著。

@@.toby;"走吧，"@@ Toby 說著，朝你甩頭示意跟上。

Emily 在 Shaw 身後關上公寓門，留下你們三人[前往 Ritter 的住處]。

passages.name: 063_Ritters
passages.content:
You follow Toby over to Ritter's apartment. He bangs on the door shouting @@.toby;"Ritz cracka!"@@ until Ritter finally answers. It's clear Ritter has been smoking up -- his eyes are bloodshot and he's got a silly grin on his face. But when he turns to you, he suddenly seems to wake up.

@@.ritt;"¡Caramba!"@@ He eyeballs you from head to toe. @@.ritt;"<<Maddie>>, cariño, you're lookin' fit!"@@

@@.matty;"Thanks,"@@ you say shyly, shrugging your shoulders.

@@.toby;"We need to borrow your ride, bro. Gonna hit the gym."@@

@@.ritt;"Oh, yeah? Cool, cool."@@ He nods and grins. @@.ritt;"Tell ya what, if <<Maddie>> promises to go to dinner with me and Kara and her friend tomorrow night, the rust-bucket is all yours. We need one more chica to even it out, ¿chido wey?"@@

Shaw grumbles, @@.shaw;"Man, that's not cool pushing an agenda."@@

@@.ritt;"Hey man, it's a favor for a favor! Hoy por ti, mañana por mi. That's all. So what do you say, <<Maddie>>?"@@

//I dunno if [[I want to go to dinner|045_Dinner]] with Ritter and his girlfriend… maybe [[I'm not interested|045_Nodinner]]?//
passages.content_zh:
你跟著 Toby 來到 Ritter 的公寓。他用力敲門大喊 @@.toby;"Ritz 餅乾！"@@ 直到 Ritter 終於來應門。很明顯 Ritter 剛抽過大麻——他眼睛充血，臉上掛著傻笑。但當他轉向你時，突然像是清醒過來。

@@.ritt;"¡Caramba！"@@ 他從頭到腳打量你。@@.ritt;"[Maddie]，親愛的，你看起來真健美！"@@

@@.matty;"謝謝，"@@ 你害羞地說，聳了聳肩。

@@.toby;"我們需要借你的車，兄弟。要去健身房。"@@

@@.ritt;"哦，是嗎？酷，酷。"@@ 他點頭咧嘴笑。@@.ritt;"這樣吧，如果 [Maddie] 答應明晚跟我、Kara 還有她朋友一起去吃晚餐，那輛破銅爛鐵就借你們。我們需要再多一個妹子來平衡一下，¿chido wey？"@@

Shaw 咕噥著，@@.shaw;"老兄，這樣夾帶私貨不太好吧。"@@

@@.ritt;"嘿，兄弟，這是以恩報恩！Hoy por ti, mañana por mi。就這樣。所以你怎麼說，[Maddie]？"@@

//我不知道[我是否想和 Ritter 跟他女友去吃飯]…也許[我沒興趣]？//

passages.name: 064_ToDougs
passages.content:
You follow Toby and Shaw down to the parking lot and hop into the back seat while he fires up Ritter's old sedan. Toby cranks up the ska-punk music and whips out of the underground lot, dodging traffic as he makes his way downtown.

@@.toby;"So, this girl thing,"@@ he says over his shoulder, @@.toby;"you're handlin' it pretty well. Like, totally awesomely well. It's super-impressive."@@

@@.matty;"Um, thanks."@@

@@.shaw;"Just like you was born to be one,"@@ Shaw adds, chuckling.

The sedan races through the streets. A few times you actually cringe as Toby overtakes someone or drifts around a hard corner. Both the guys seem totally at ease with his driving -- even though Shaw has a deathgrip on the handle above the passenger door.

Finally, the car skids softly to a stop outside of a dilapidated ruin of a single-family house. The gravel yard is weed-infested and there are bars on all the windows.

Toby hops out and waves to you. @@.toby;"[[Let's go|065_DougHouse]]!"@@

passages.name: 065_DougHouse
passages.content:
<<sa "doug_met">>\
You get out of the car and follow Toby and Shaw up the cracked sidewalk. The barred screendoor creaks open by itself as the three of you approach and the old wooden door opens up moments later.

Toby and Shaw walk in without a word. You step into the darkness inside…

And find yourself in some sort of huge high-tech hospital-looking room that takes up what must be most of the first floor. The walls are made of a white padded fabric and the tile floors are shiny and spotless. In the far corner of this massive room is a raised area where a wheelchair-bound man sits with his back to you in the middle of seven large high-definition computer monitors.

As the three of you walk closer, he spins around in his wheelchair and rolls himself out of the circle of monitors.

@@.doug;"Hello, boys,"@@ he says, smirking. He wears a thick pair of glasses on a wide nose. His hair is perfectly styled and he seems to be in good shape other than for a noticeable gut. His skinny legs are hidden under slim jeans.

Shaw [[ushers you next to Toby|065_DougHouse2]] with his hand on your arm.

passages.name: 065_DougHouse2
passages.content:
@@.toby;"Doug,"@@ Toby says, @@.toby;"this is <<Maddie>>."@@

@@.doug;"<<Maddie>>!"@@ Doug smiles and looks you up and down. @@.doug;"Well, look at this! Isn't the future amazing, gentlemen?"@@

@@.shaw;"Look, motherfucker, we brought her. You said you could help her out so here we are. Let's do this already. We got plans."@@

@@.doug;"Oh no no no! <<Maddie>> will be staying here tonight. We have a LOT to talk about, gentlemen. So make yourselves scarce, understand?"@@

@@.toby;"<<Maddie>>'s my friend--"@@

@@.doug;"Oh be quiet, Toby. I'm sure he's already quite aware of your flattering attempts to make restitution for your sins! No harm will come to him while he's here -- which is more than I can say if I'd allowed him to stay with you lot much longer."@@

@@.shaw;"Hey, we're dealin' with it. Are YOU dealin' with the Wolfe pack?"@@

Doug laughs. @@.doug;"You want protection, you better start making payments. Now get the ''FUCK OUT OF MY HOUSE''. You can come back in the morning for him."@@

Toby pats your upper arm. @@.toby;"We'll be back first thing tomorrow. Don't worry, he's an asshole but he won't hurt you. Remember what I said, <<Maddie>>. I meant it."@@

<<if sa("shaw_sissyfuck") or sa("shaw_sweetfuck")>>\
Shaw gives you a slight nod.

<<endif>>\
The guys turn and make their way out of the house. The door swings shut and you hear it lock behind them.

@@.doug;"Now, do you prefer Matt or have you saddled yourself with that abberation of your name, <<Maddie>>?"@@

//[[I prefer my new name|066_Maddie]], right? But… maybe [[I DO prefer Matt|066_Matt]].//

passages.name: 066_Maddie
passages.content:
<<pc "prefname" $player.name>>\
@@.matty;"<<Maddie>>,"@@ you answer.

@@.doug;"I see. Already quite brainwashed then. Do you even remember who you used to be -- what you used to stand for? But it doesn't matter now, does it? But it's time to liberate yourself of the moniker they forced upon you. Pick a new one. Don't think about it too hard -- say the name that comes to mind."@@

<<include "066_BeforeName">>\

passages.name: 066_Matt
passages.content:
<<pc "prefname" "Matt">>\
@@.matty;"Matt,"@@ you answer.

@@.doug;"Really? Well, maybe your willpower is greater than I had anticipated -- which certainly bodes well for the future. Of course, Matt, what you truly prefer and what you truly receive are hardly the same things these days, are they? That name just won't do for you after tonight. Pick a new one. Don't think about it too hard -- say the name that comes to mind."@@

<<include "066_BeforeName">>\

passages.name: 066_BeforeName
passages.content:
<>
//I guess [[that's my new name|066_AfterName]]…//

passages.name: 066_AfterName
passages.content: <>\ Doug wheels closer to you and \ <>\ grins up at you. @@.doug;"<>. Yes, it suits you -- or rather, will suit you."@@ \ <>\ gives you a confused look. @@.doug;"Fine. Keep your slave name. I suppose you've grown into it."@@ \ <>\ He sighs and nods. @@.doug;"I don't believe you'll ever understand the significance of what has happened here: to you, around you, for you, and -- ''yes'' -- against you. But I can, and will, try to help you. I'm not going to ask you any questions. I don't care about your motivations. But I do wonder if you care about them?"@@ He leans back in his wheelchair and tents his fingers in front of him while resting his elbows on the armrests. @@.doug;"Of course I've been watching your progress. I have eyes and ears places you wouldn't believe.<> You've taken up with Shaw -- and 'taken it up' with Shaw -- but do you know why? He's a brute -- a thug -- and at the same time an immature manchild when he doesn't get his way.<> You've rebuffed Shaw's advances, which bodes well for your willpower and therefore your future.<> But still you coddle him. That's curious.<><> Shaw is a bully and a thug and you'd do well to stop associating with him altogether.<> Toby is meek and compliant -- on the surface. Strange that he happened to be there to help the very day you lose both your employment and your apartment, hmm?<> Yet still you have befriended him -- maybe even trust him -- in the face of some strange evidence.<> And that bitch Emily… <>she's got you twisted around her finger, grooming you to please her friend and brother and be their fuckin' maid like that's what ''you'' want out of life.<
passages.content_zh:
\
Doug 把輪椅轉近你，\
[IF pc("name") neq "Maddie"]\
咧嘴朝你一笑。

@@.doug;"[Maddie]。沒錯，這名字適合你——或者說，將會適合你。"@@ \
[ELSE]\
給了你一個困惑的表情。

@@.doug;"好吧。繼續用你那個奴隸名字吧。我想你也已經長成那名字的樣子了。"@@ \
[/IF]\
